149b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'byung ba nub par bgyi ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' bka' mchid zab mo 'chab cing 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud
149b7(mdo sde): kyi lcags kyu ste dgu pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i bshes gnyen ltar bcos pa/ sdig pa'i grogs po gang dag de la bsdu ba'i dngos po rnams las
150a1(mdo sde): 'dun pa zlog pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa las bdun pa zlog pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba las 'dun pa zlog pa dang bsod/
150a2(mdo sde): nams kyi tshogs las 'dun pa zlog pa dang / rab tu dben pa la sbyor ba dang / don nyung zhing bgying pa nyung ba la sbyor ba dang / na thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i dka' mchid de la
150a3(mdo sde): rgyun tu mang du ston pa ston pa dang / zag pa chen po dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid de la mi ston pa dag la brnyan cing rten/ bsten te bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben
150a4(mdo sde): par gnas pas theg pa chen po las ldang ba de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' gdon mi za bar zhal ta byed par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor la gang gi
150a5(mdo sde): tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhal ta bgyid pa'i dri ma la sbyor ba de'i tshedaben pa la sbyor zhing mtshan ma dang bcas pa dang / rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i bzod pa'i sa nye bar ston/ byang chub
150a6(mdo sde): sems dpa'i las yang dag par/ yang dag phum gang lags pa de dag de la mi ston to// byang chub sems dpa' las yang dag par yang dag yul de dag gang lags she na @
150a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag pa yang dag phul lags so// bcu po de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dad pa'i rtsa ba la rab tu gnas te/
150b1(mdo sde): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten cing bstan te/ bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang / mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du dge ba'i chos ci zhes yongs su chos
150b2(mdo sde): ba dang / dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa la gnas te yang dag pa'i brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang / bag mchis par las bgyis pa chud mi bzon pa dang / bdag
150b3(mdo sde): bde ba la mi chags par rtag par rgyun tu sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / lus dang srog la mi lta bar dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa dang
150b4(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa'i slad du bsod nams kyi tshogs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / gzungs dang
150b5(mdo sde): spobs pa rab tu thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba dang / so so'i skye bo thams cad kyi sas mi gos par bgyi ba'i slad du/ shes rab kyi
150b6(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa las shin tu be zla ba'i slad du/ thabs la mkhas pa yongs su tshol ba ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos
150b7(mdo sde): bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i las yang dag phul lag te/ gang dag la byang chub sems dpas bslab par bgyi ba de de dag de la mi ston pa dang / de la 'di skad du byang chub ni/ byang
151a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i yin gyi le lo can gyi ma yin no// gal te khyod bskal pa brgyad dam bcus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
151a2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas na/ phyis khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so zhes mchil/ bcom ldan 'das de la byang chub sems dpa'
151a3(mdo sde): gang sgyid lug nas 'bras bu thob par bgyid pa'i gnas mchis na bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'o bshes gnyer ltar bcos pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu pa'o// bcom
151a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/ deng rgyal des bla ma rnams dang sbyin gnas rnams dang / pha ma dang slob dpon dang mkhan
151a5(mdo sde): bo rnams dang / de las gzhan pa bla ma lta bu'i gang zag rnams la kun tu 'dud pa dang / 'dud pa dang / rab tu bdud par mi bgyid cing / de la ma gus par gyur pa dang / gang dag byang
151a6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams la mkhas pa khyad par thob pa gzungs dang spong ba phun sum tshogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i bgyi ba thams cad tshar phyin pa de dag gi gan du mi mchi mi bskrun
151a7(mdo sde): mi bsten bsnyen bkur mi bgyid yongs su mi 'dri yongs su 'dri bar mi grol cing de ma thos pa'i chos can par mi bgyid thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi
151b1(mdo sde): bgyid de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang bag gang dag bdud kyi lugs blam sa bya chos ngan pa la spyod pa de dag la dga' bad pa dang / byedag pa bya'i rlu
151b2(mdo sde): rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / de dman pa la ston cing byung bar dang thal pa 'di sa s+ho/ na pa'i 'gro ba/ thun pA 'on pa/ lpags pa'i 'grob 'gro ba dman pa cing du mchi bar
151b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltas/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig gis tham pa'i sa phyogs su shing tsam pa ka bsrun bskrun la chab stsol bar mi bgyid kyi/ gang nas
151b4(mdo sde): chab mchi bar mthong ba'i phyogs de yang gor ma dang gyo mog dag gis bkum na bcom ldan 'das de ltar na zhugs shing tsam ka chab dang bral ba de la yal ga dang lo ma dang yal gze'u ma
151b5(mdo sde): chags pa rnams kyang chags par mi 'gyur/ yal ka dang / lo ma dang / yal ga phre'u chags pa rnams kyang skams ste/ dog sa la ltung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byung
151b6(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems bskyed la nga rgyal gyis khengs shing nga rgyal gyi rengs par gyur na/ de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / chos mnyan pa dang bral te/ ma thos pa'i chos
151b7(mdo sde): rnams kyang mi nyan thos pa'i chos rnams kyang yongs su dkar bar mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na gang gi tshe rgya mtsho chen po mchi bar gyur pa de'i tshe//
152a1(mdo sde): gzhol ba'i phyogs na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de gzhol ba'i skad du chu klung thams cad dang / chab mig dang 'bab chu thams cad tshegs chung ngus der 'bab bo// bcom
152a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal ma mchis pa bla ma dang / sbyin gnas la gus pa yang tshegs chung ngus chos zab mo'i sgo rnams rna ba'i dbang po la grags par 'gyur ro// de dran pa la
152a3(mdo sde): yang gnas par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' nga rgyal gyis khengs nga rgyal gyis rengs par gyur te/ bla ma dang sbyin gnas rnams la kun tu mi 'dud cing 'du
152a4(mdo sde): par mi bgyid la rab tu mi 'dud na/ bcom ldan 'das kye ma'o byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyus zin par rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nga
152a5(mdo sde): rgyal dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gcig pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzugs bzang zhing / mdzes la phyug cing nor che ba dang
152a6(mdo sde): longs spyod che zhing nor mang la/ mdzod dang bang ba mang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/ gzugs dang longs spyod dang / rus dang / rigs dang / g.yog 'khor dang bsod nams
152a7(mdo sde): kyi tshogs kyis brtan par gyur/ ye shes tshogs yongasra btsal ba la mngon par brtson zhing de gzugs dang / longs spyod dang / g.yog 'khor dang / dbang phyug gi stobs kyis
152b1(mdo sde): rgyags shing bag ma mchis par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rab tu byung bar gtogs pa khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba/ ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su tshol ba la brtson
152b2(mdo sde): pa gdugs dang bser mas sha dang khrag bskams pa/ skem pa nyam chung ba lus rtsas yog pa/ mgo dang gos la zhugs 'bar ba bzhin du gdugs mtshan du brtson
152b3(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba la rtag tu brtson pa dang ldan pa de dag la skems shing nyam chung la/ mdog ngan cing mi sdug par rig nas/ brnyas par bya'o/
152b4(mdo sde): snyam du sems shing de dag las legs par bshad pa nyan mi 'tshal gyi/ de de bas shas cher dman zhing ches rmugs par 'gyur ba 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
152b5(mdo sde): dpa'i rgyags pa dang // bag ma mchis pa dang rab tu ldan pa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu ste bcu gnyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bcu gnyis po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
152b6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag las shin tum 'das na/ tha na rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa yang mi mthob na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
152b7(mdo sde): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba lta smos kyang mi 'tshal te/ de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag
153a1(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag las shin tu 'da' bar bgyi'o//
153a2(mdo sde): bam po bcu pa ste tha ma'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis
153a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud kyi lcags kyu 'di dag legs par bshad pa legs so legs so// blo gros rgya mtsho de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang
153a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' dag gang la gnas na/ bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'da' bar 'gyur ba bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo khyod la bshad do//
153a5(mdo sde): gros rgya mtsho bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo de dag gang zhe na/ blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo yin no// bcu gang
153a6(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ri stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin pas stong pa nyid kyi rnam par zhugs kyang bdag nyid skyabs byed pas
153a7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la cher byams pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dang po'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa'i rang bzhin
153b1(mdo sde): bas/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang yongs su thar bar byed pas sems can thams cad la cher snying rje ba 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sku
153b2(mdo sde): gAnyis pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang sems can thams cad yongs su sbyin par bya ba'i
153b3(mdo sde): phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo gsum pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas
153b4(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang / 'dod chags la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo
153b5(mdo sde): bzhi pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas/ zhe sdang dang bral ba'i rnam par zhugs kyang zhe sdang la spyod pa'o sems can yongs su smin
153b6(mdo sde): par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo lnga pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni gti mug dang bral ba'i rang bzhin pas gti mug dang bral ba'i
153b7(mdo sde): rnam par zhugs kyang / gti mug la spyod pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo drug pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams/
154a1(mdo sde): cad ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems can yongs su
154a2(mdo sde): smin par byed pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bdun pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni skye ba med cing 'byung ba med pa'i rang bzhin pas skye ba med/
154a3(mdo sde): cing 'byung ba med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba spangs pa'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston pa 'di ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod
154a4(mdo sde): ba'i chos kyi sgo brgyud pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho chos thams cad ni ngang mnyam zhing bye zag med pa'i rang bzhin pas/ ngang mnyam zhing bye brag med pa'i rnam par zhugs kyang theg pa chen po'i
154a5(mdo sde): bsam pa yongs su mi 'dor bar sems can rnams la theg pa gsum rnam par dgod pa'i chos ston pa 'di ni/ bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo dgu pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsha
154a6(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang yid dang / rnam par shes pa la yang mi gnas la/ byang chub kyi sems kyang mi brjed/ rtsom pa thams cad dang yang bral la/ sems can
154a7(mdo sde): rab tu thar par bya ba'i rtsom pa yang mi 'dor spyod pa thams cad las kyang shin tu 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las kyang mi ldog pa 'di ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho byang chub semra
154b1(mdo sde): dpa'i bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgo bcu pa'o// blo gros rgya mtsho bcu po 'di dag ni bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi sgras/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rab
154b2(mdo sde): tu sbyor na/ bdud kyi lcags kyu thams cad las shin tu 'das par 'gyur ro// bdud kyi lcags kyu rab tu gcod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog
154b3(mdo sde): mog por gyur te/ rnam pa drug tu gsos so// 'di lta ste/ dper na/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i mdzod spu nas 'od rab tu byung bas bdud kyi
154b4(mdo sde): gnas thams cad mog log par gyur pa de bzhin du de'i tshe/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis lhas rgya chen po 'di mthong nas rings
154b5(mdo sde): shing myur bar la gor du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bsdus te/ bkod pa ci 'dra bas byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'gro ba'i bkod pa de 'dra bas dpag
154b6(mdo sde): tshad sum cu rtsa drug tshun chad bdud kyi sdes bkang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor dkyil 'khor gyi khyams ga la ba der dong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mthus der de bsgrims par gyur teka 'ongs
154b7(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'khor de las sems can gang dag 'dul bar gyur pa rnams dang / gang dag srid par kun tu
155a1(mdo sde): sbyor ba spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa lta ba phun sum tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par gang gis kyang de ma mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
155a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis bdud sdig can bkod pa ji lta bu dag 'ong ba mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//
155a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho bdud sdig can 'di ni chos kyis rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya ba'i phyir 'ongs na da ci zhig bya/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das deng 'di bde ba
155a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'phang bar bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces smras so//
155a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni ga la yod/ de na chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan ni ci zhes bya/ blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ bcu
155a6(mdo sde): pa shwa ri'i bu shar phyogs log su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten
155a7(mdo sde): gyi khams yod de/ de ra de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba chos ston to// de ci'i phyir 'jig chen gyi khams de bdeg
155b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyis brgyar pa zhes bya zhe na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten khyams de na bde ba'i rgyu dang yon tan gyi rgyu dang / bkod pa'i rgyu bskal par/
155b2(mdo sde): brjod kyang zad par mi nus te/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa zhes bya'o// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
155b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'joms pa des byang chub thob pa de'i tshe/ de byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par lus las bdud kun tu bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung nas/
155b4(mdo sde): 'od zer nges bskul bas// 'jig rten gyi khams de na bdud bye ba zag brgya 'khod pa/ bdud re re zhing yang g.yog 'khor bye ba brgya phrag bcu yod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyir
155b5(mdo sde): nas/ byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad bya bar bsams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' la bar chad byed ma nus te/ de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs gnyis la gtugs so// des
155b6(mdo sde): kyang ji ltar de dag bsam pa thag pa nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar bdud de dag la chos bstan nas/ bcom ldan 'das de phyis byang chub thob ste/
155b7(mdo sde): de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de bdud rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya'o// de byang chub thob pa'i mchog gi phrugs dang / bzang po'i phrugs kyang bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so//
156a1(mdo sde): rim gro pa yang bdud las brtul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhi gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i gtam
156a2(mdo sde): 'ba' shig yang dag par rab tu ston te/ de na theg pa gzhan gyi ming yang med de/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de ni de 'dra ste/ der 'phangs na phyis bdud kyi
156a3(mdo sde): las byed par mi 'gyur gyi/ bdud las brtul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dag dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
156a4(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can sngangs skrag 'jigs te/ spu zing zhes byed nas 'khor de nas 'gro bar 'dod na 'gro ma nus te/ mi snang bar ma gyur nasade de bas kyang cher
156a5(mdo sde): spangs shing skrag ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'jig rten gyi khams der 'phang bar mi 'gyur bas/
156a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag la skyab tu gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bdag la bskyab tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sdig can ma 'jigs shig/ skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu
156a7(mdo sde): dag ni/ sems can la rnam par 'tshe ba'i phyir gnas pa ma yin no// sdig can khyod byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di la bzod pa gsol cig dang / 'di nyid khyod la skyob par 'gyur ro//
156b1(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can gyis thal mo sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod bdag la bzod pa mdzad du gsol/
156b2(mdo sde): bdag bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der mi 'phangs par gsolaji ltar gang na skyes bu dam pa khyod lta bu chos ston par 'gyur ba'i 'khor der bar chad bgyi ba'i slad du la na
156b3(mdo sde): 'ga' yang mchi bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// blo gros rgya mtshos smras pa/ sdig car kho bo lta bu dag la gzod pa gsol mi dgos so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ sems can thams
156b4(mdo sde): cad la shin tu bzod pa nyid do// sdig can khyod bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der song la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bkod pa de dag dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
156b5(mdo sde): pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la ltos shig dang / khyod la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos lag pa g.yas pa gser gyi kha dog can brkyang ste/ bdud
156b6(mdo sde): sdig can gyi spyi bor bzhag nas/ bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos kyi ser sna dang / slob dpon chos kyi dpe mkhyud med pa'i bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig
156b7(mdo sde): des bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ci 'dra bar bdud sdig can gyi yang de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de lta bu'i bden pa'i byin gyis rlabs byas so// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos tshig de skar
157a1(mdo sde): / ces smras ma thag tu/ de nas bdud sdig can rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs mchog dang ldan par gyur te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
157a2(mdo sde): rnam par drug tu g.yos par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i byin gyis rlabs kyis skad cig thang cig yud tsam de
157a3(mdo sde): la bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
157a4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdud rab tu 'jom pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu bdug
157a5(mdo sde): go de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'khod pa de dag
157a6(mdo sde): gis bdud sdig can de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can dbang chung
157a7(mdo sde): zhing mdog ngan la mi sdug pa 'di lta bu 'di gang nas mchis bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas gang gA'i klung bcu
157b1(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
157b2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so// 'tsho'o// gzhes so// de 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher ston to// yang dag par rab tu 'chad do// der phyogs bcu nas byang chub sems dpal tshad med grangs
157b3(mdo sde): med cing bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa dag/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus so// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho zhes bya ba
157b4(mdo sde): go cha bsam gyis mi khyab pa bgos pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la yongs su 'dri zhing yongs su 'drir 'jug pa yang 'dus par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs de'i tha ma bshad pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig can
157b5(mdo sde): mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ongs pa dang / skyes bu dam pa de'i 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar gzung ste bdud sdig can de 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'phangs so// de nas/
157b6(mdo sde): bdud las btul ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo cag kyang khyod kyi grogs yin gyis/ sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
157b7(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo cag kyang bdud du gyur te // sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa la kho bo cag de bzhin gshegs pas tha
158a1(mdo sde): ra med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de lta bas na sdig can khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig
158a2(mdo sde): nas bdud sdig can gyi lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ chog 'di skad ces bdag gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
158a3(mdo sde): sems bskyed de/ phyin chang bdud kyi las mi bya'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bdud sdig can rin po che bkod pa'i seng ge'i khril bzhag ste
158a4(mdo sde): de nas 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gtam rgyud ci 'dra ba la rigs kyi bu khyod spobs par gyis shig ces gsol ba btab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' blo
158a5(mdo sde): gros rgya mtshos gang bdud sdig can seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa'i kha'i sgo dang / ba spu'i khung thams cad nas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u rab tu bshad pa lta bu'i
158a6(mdo sde): gtam byung ste/ yi ge de dag dang tshig dang / yi ge'i 'bru de dag dang mnam zhing mi nyung mi mang ma lhag par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyir gyis brlabs byas so// de ras byang chub sems dpa' de dag
158a7(mdo sde): gis bdud sdig can de las 'dus pa chen po'i le'u gtam thos nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad
158b1(mdo sde): de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de dang / byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mchod dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de/
158b2(mdo sde): balnga bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pas mdzod smra nas/ gzugs thams cad ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od gzer zung ste/ 'od
158b3(mdo sde): gzer byung ba des sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu gnyis kyi bye ma snyed de dag las 'das te/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// der byang chub sems dpa'
158b4(mdo sde): de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na bskal pa brgyar yang bsngags pa'i mthar mi phyin pa'i seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs te phyogs
158b5(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
158b6(mdo sde): blo gros rgya mtsho yang mthong ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed chus yongs su gang ba'i rgya mtsho gcig lta bur gnas pa 'di yang mthong ngo // den sgrib pa ci yang med par mthong ngo // phyogs
158b7(mdo sde): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam gyi rin po che'i pad+ma dag la 'khod cing chos nyan pa de dag kyang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshim zhing
159a1(mdo sde): mgul yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der logs su me tog
159a2(mdo sde): gtor to// gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi gdugs chen por gyur to// der thams cad dang ldan
159a3(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor des/ me tog gi gdugs de mthong nas/ ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang me tog gi gdugs 'di lta bur gyur pa'i
159a4(mdo sde): me tog 'di dag gang nas mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa grogs po dag me tog 'di dag ni bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas
159a5(mdo sde): 'ongs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis ngal mchod pa'i las kyi phyir gtor to// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig
159a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang / bdud sdig can 'jig rten gyi khams de na ci bgyid pa blta bar bgyi'o//
159a7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor des gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan
159b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang / bdud sdig can de 'khor 'di la ston cig de nas bcom ldan
159b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis skabs phye bas/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos sor mo bcu las 'od gzer stong phrag bcu phyung nas/ 'od gzer de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung bcu
159b3(mdo sde): gnyis kyi bye ma sbed po de dag las 'das nas bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to// der thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang
159b4(mdo sde): bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de dang / bdud sdig can chos kyi khri chen po la
159b5(mdo sde): 'dug ste/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i gtam rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa yang mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur nas rang rang
159b6(mdo sde): pad+ma'i stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la phyag 'tshal nas de dag gis mu tig dang me tog gis gtor to// gtor
159b7(mdo sde): ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'ongs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug gi mtshams su me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa chen por gnas par kun tu snang ngo //
160a1(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rab tu 'joms pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag mi mjed kyi 'jig
160a2(mdo sde): rten gyi khams su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i gan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu de'i dus la bab par shes ra khyod song shig/ de nas
160a3(mdo sde): bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan bdun bskor ba byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
160a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho'i byin gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul gyis skad cig thang cig yul tsam de las mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ga la
160a5(mdo sde): ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lar bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/
160a6(mdo sde): de ras tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa de mthong ngam/
160a7(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bdag gis 'jig rten gyi khams ji tsam du yongs su dag pa de mthong ste/ ji ltar dag cing dri ma med pa'i sems can mchog byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gnas
160b1(mdo sde): dengo ngo mtshar to// bdag gis de mthong nas kyang tha na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// smras pa/ grogs po khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
160b2(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed na/ khyod ci yang bdud kyi las blta byed dam smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la
160b3(mdo sde): gang gis kyang bdud kyi las byed mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji lta ji ltar bdud las byed pa de lta de ltar
160b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams ches stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus rtsom mo// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyi rnam grangs 'dis kyang gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdud kyi las
160b5(mdo sde): byed pa de nyid sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las su brjod kyi bdud kyi las ma yin pa de ltar rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa dang / bdud kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa 'di bshad
160b6(mdo sde): ba ra/ 'khor de las srog chags nyi khris bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bdud kyi 'khor de las kyang bdud kyi bu khris bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
160b7(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed nas mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan pa der skye bar gyur cig ces tshig de skad smras pa dang / bcom ldan/
161a1(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar lung bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun tu bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas
161a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub 'di ni bar chad mang ba phyir rgol ba mang ba
161a3(mdo sde): lags na/ gang 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis nub par mi 'gyur zhing rgyas par 'gyur ba dang gang dag 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang /
161a4(mdo sde): ston pa de dag la yang bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag kyang kun tu bsrung
161a5(mdo sde): ba dang / sra ba dang / yongs su gzung ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par byin gyis brlabs tu gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan
161a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di dag 'dzin pa dang / ston par 'gyur zhing
161a7(mdo sde): 'dod pa/ brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ dge pa'i rtsa bskyed pa de dag 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs zin to// blo gros rgya mtsho do'i phyir les/
161b1(mdo sde): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / tshig gang dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi dag bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de dag kyang yongs su gzung ba'i
161b2(mdo sde): phyir nan tan byed par 'gyur bar rgyal po chen po bzhi dgugs pa'i tshig rnams brjod par bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho dgug pa'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa me sa ma san d+hi/
161b3(mdo sde): sa ra ne/ sa ra ba ti/ d+ha re/ dA na/ ba ti d+hu drA me/ d+hu d+hu ma ti/ A ba te/ a ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ra dze/ ka ka re/ kA ru Ne/ hu hu ka hu hu ba tI Da hu hu san d+hI/
161b4(mdo sde): rIr g+ha ta ni/ a bad Te/ bI bad Te/ ma d+hu ma ti/ ma ri dzaM tA/ bi shud d+he pa ti/ mi si le/ ma nor ha re/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni/ dgug pa'i tshig rnam yin te/ tshig de dag
161b5(mdo sde): gis rgyal po chen po bzhi bkug nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de yang yongs su bzung ba'i phyir nAn tan byed par 'gyur ro// sngags kyi tshig 'di nam/
161b6(mdo sde): chos smra ba des legs par kha ton tu byas te/ phyogs bzhir byams pas khyab par byas la/ rgyal po chen po bzhi bsams na sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi dkun
161b7(mdo sde): nas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa de dag stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal
162a1(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag lhan cig tu 'thun par gang na yang dag par/
162a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i rgyud kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba der/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang kun tu bsrung ba dang / chos smra ba de yang yongs su gzung ba dang // ci nas gang
162a3(mdo sde): gis kyang ma bsgribs pa 'am/ gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du mchi bar bgyi'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgugs pa'i tshig brjod par
162a4(mdo sde): bya ste/ tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ro// lha'i dbang po brgya byi dgug par 'gyur ba'i tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dza yi/ dza ya ma ti/ Ad /
162a5(mdo sde): ma Te/ mAng ku re/ sid+d+ha ma ti/ shu b+hau/ shAnau ti ka re/ nA da ne/ dAn te/ dA na ta ma ti/ ta da ka raM/ kA ye/ k+Sha ya mu khe/ u bdA Te ni/ bi bad Ta ni/ pa ri bad Ta ni/
162a6(mdo sde): ba ri tshe de smi ti/ spr-i ti sin d+hi/ yA gats+tsha ko'u shi ka nirdzi tA/ a su ra/ dza yan taM de ba sa ma ya ste/ a rab d+ho/ d+harma ni dzi to// ra ma hi sA s+yA ya nam b+hu tA nAm/
162a7(mdo sde): a rak+Sha d+ham tsa ri nam/ blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig ste de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug par 'gyur ro// der chos smra ba des sngags kyi
162b1(mdo sde): tshig 'di dag legs par kha ton du byas la gtsang ba dang / gtsang sbra'i cho gas khrus legs par byas te/ gos bzang po bgos la shar phyogs su me tog gtor te/ sangs
162b2(mdo sde): rgyas thams cad bsams pa'i dran pa dang / sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po dang rab tu ldan pas/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin bsams la
162b3(mdo sde): ko'u shi ka 'khor legs par yongs su bzhag pa'i phyir tshur shog/ sngags grub pa mngon sum du gyi/ de'i bsam pa shin tu rnam par dag cing yongs su dag la tshul khrims yongs su
162b4(mdo sde): dag pas bsams ma thag tu lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'ongs nas/ 'khor yongs su 'jog par 'gyur/ sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar sgrub par 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i
162b5(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su bzung
162b6(mdo sde): ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du bdag chos smra ba de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi/ de'i 'khor kyang yongs su bzhag par bgyi/ sngags kyi grub pa yang nye bar bsgrub par
162b7(mdo sde): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom
163a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di las bstan pa'i slad du'o//
163a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos le gus par bgyis te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher
163a3(mdo sde): yang dag par rab tu bskur bar bgyi'o// oM / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byir te/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yongs
163a4(mdo sde): su bzung ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so// de lta bu ni khyod kyi bya ba'o// lha'i dbang po brgya byin khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsams na/ lha rnams ni rgyal
163a5(mdo sde): zhing / lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams tshar gcad pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams brjod par bya ste
163a6(mdo sde): sngags kyi tshig de dag gis bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi rtsa rnams char gcod par 'gyur ro// sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha me/ shA ma pa ti/ sha mi ta sha d+hu/ yang gu re/
163a7(mdo sde): mang gu re/ mA ra dzi te/ kur Ti su ka ki su re/ te dzo ba ti/ oM lo yan/ bai sha Sha narma le/ ma lA pa na ye/ khu khu ra/ kha ga gras/ gra sa ni/ o mu khi pa rAng mu khI/ Amra
163b1(mdo sde): khI/ sha mi ta ni ka sarba grA ha ban d+hAnA nA~M/ gr-I hi tA/ sarba mA ra pra bA dzi ni/ bi mug NI mA ra pA shwa/ s+t+ri bi tA dud+ha mu dra/ a nud gti tA sarba pA re/ pu tsa ri ta ka pad pa ri ud d+h+ya/ bi ga d+han tu/
163b2(mdo sde): sarba mA ra karma Ni/ blo gros rgya mtsho tshig 'di dag ni bdud tshar gcad pa'i tshig/ nyon mongs pa bsale ba'i cho ga ste/ de dag chos smra ba des legs par kha don tu byas la chos kyi khri la 'dug ste/
163b3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pas/ 'khor thams cad la khyab par byas la/ bdag la sman par 'du shes bskyed de/ chos la sman gyi 'du shes dang / chos can pa la nad
163b4(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la skyes bu dam pa'i 'du shes dang / chos kyi tshul la yun ring du gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed la/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag mngon du byas te/ chos
163b5(mdo sde): kyi gtam byed na/ de'i 'khor yug dpag tshad brgya tshun chad du bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams mig gis mi tshol bar bya ba'i las kyi phyir 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro// gang dag 'ong ba de dag kyang
163b6(mdo sde): bar chad byed par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang bdag byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos
163b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba thams cad kyis brgyan par 'phangs pa/ skyes bu dam pa de dag gis byer gyi rlabs dang / rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul 'di dag la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das
164a1(mdo sde): bdag deng slad chad bdud kyi sug las thams cad 'dor ro// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa dang / yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/ grong khyer/
164a2(mdo sde): ram grong rdal lam/ gtsug lag khang der chos mnyan pa'i slad du bdag nga rgyal ma mchis pa dang / gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas pas mchi bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
164a3(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ sdig can legs so legs so// khyod chos la gus pa'i rnam par smin pa 'dis rim gyis bdud kyi las thams cad las shin tu 'das te/ gang skyed bu dam pa de dag gis
164a4(mdo sde): thob pa'i chos de dag rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho gzhan yang mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bya ste/ dgug pa'o sngags kyi tshig de
164a5(mdo sde): dag gis tshangs pa bkug nas chos smra ba'i gan du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ me tre ka re/ ka ru NA ka re/ mug ti ta ka re u peg k+Sha ka rA
164a6(mdo sde): buH ka re/ d+ham ka ra~M/ sa thA kar/ mu kri ta brji/ mad+hU bi rjen/ ni swa re/ rnabye mdzo ba ti/ so jog me d+ham na da / sa t+ya kr-i tin+da ni/ grub pa d+d+ha
164a7(mdo sde): cad tho ba sha me/ bya ba lo ka sa ma man/ bud ti Sh+Tha sa dza~M d+hi/ a be+e Sha sa ngas can n+dan ku ru sad rnam pa'i mamanas kr-i tam nu bral sa bud+ha na~M/ rjems bya ba cheg pa/
164b1(mdo sde): s+pha ra ta/ d+ham tsakra pra bsnunan/ ku ru sa twa bi bo d+ha nAn/ pra ti gra d+ha na d+harmA nAM/ gar m+b+ha lA ta na/ bud+d+ha a d+hiSh+Tha nam ma br-i ko ba swA blo gros rgya mtsho mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pa
164b2(mdo sde): dkrug pa'i tshig 'di dag chos smra ba des legs par kha don du byas la/ tshangs pa'i lam la shin tu gnas te/ zhe 'bras pa med pa'i sems kyi rgyud dang / dbang po shin tu sbas pa dang /
164b3(mdo sde): shin tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang / shin tu dkar ba'i phyag rgya dang / shin tu yongs su dag pa'i lus kyi las dang / shin tu bden pas zin pa'i ngag gi las dang / shin tu brtan pa'i blo dang /
164b4(mdo sde): legs par byas pa'i bzod pa'i las dang / shin tu yongs su sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / legs par brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / shin tu bsten pa'i mang du
164b5(mdo sde): thos pa dang / shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i sems las su rung ba dang / shin tu rno ba'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang / shin tu brtson pa'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba dang / byang chub kyi
164b6(mdo sde): sems kyis legs par zin pa dang / shin tu yongs su bsgoms pa'i byams pa dang / shin tu bcan pa'i snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pa dang /
164b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las shin tu yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa bsams la/ chos kyi gtam yang dag
165a1(mdo sde): par rab tu brjod na/ des bsams ma thag tu tshangs pa tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang lhar cig tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// blo gros rgya mtsho de la tshangs pa 'ong bar
165a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i bltas ni 'di lta bu 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor thams cad byams pa'i sems su 'gyur ba dang / dbang po nyams pa med pa dang / gcig la
165a3(mdo sde): gcig mi gnod par gnas pa dang chos dang chos smra ba la ston pa dang / bla ma ltar phangs par sems pa dang thal mo sbyor ba dang sems rtse gcig pa dang
165a4(mdo sde): g.yeng bar yid la byed pa dang / rus shing ltar byed pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / sems can thams cad kyis sems dang / rna ba blags te nyan par 'gyur ba'o//
165a5(mdo sde): chos smra ba de la yang sngon lung ma mnos pa dang / sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams kyang mngon du 'gyur ba ste/ 'khor der mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'ongs par rigs
165a6(mdo sde): bar bya'o// de nas mo mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
165a7(mdo sde): bdag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa'i bde ba la gnas pa bor la/ gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ston pa'i 'khor dar mchi bar
165b1(mdo sde): bgyi'o// chos smra ba de la yang chos brgyad bsgrub par bgyi'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du/ de la dran pa bsgrub par bgyi/
165b2(mdo sde): chos zab mo rtog par bgyi ba'i skad du de la blo gros bsgrub par bgyi/ don gyi rnam pa rtog par bgyi ba'i skad du de la rtogs par bsgrub par bgyi the tsom thams cad gcad pa'i
165b3(mdo sde): slad du de la spobs pa bsgrub par bgyi/ skad dang nges pa'i tshig thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par bgyi ba'i skad du/ de la lung bstan pa phun sum tshogs par bsgru
165b4(mdo sde): par bgyi 'khor thams cad zil gyi mi non par bgyi ba'i skad du/ de la 'dul bar bsrung ba bsgrub par bgyi/ mi dman par lung bstan par bya ba'i slad du/ de la chos
165b5(mdo sde): kyi snang ba sgrub par bgyi/ de bgyid cing chos bsgrub pa'i slad du/ de la nges 'byung ba'i sgo bsgrub par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba de la chos brgyad po
165b6(mdo sde): 'di dag bsgrub par bgyi'o// chos smra ba de la bsrung zhig smra ba dang / dam pa'i chos kyang yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs
165b7(mdo sde): pa nyid kyi byon gyis brlabs kyis ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'ang rgyas par 'gyur ba ltar bdud thams cad dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar gcad par bgyi'o//
166a1(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das te tha ma/
166a2(mdo sde): dus kyi tshe ci nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi sug par mchi ba dang khong du chud pa dang glegs bam du 'gyur zhing nub par mi 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das
166a3(mdo sde): nyid kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'a das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas
166a4(mdo sde): mdzod spu nas 'di lta bu'i 'od phyung ste/ 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po
166a5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'drin/ rtswa dang shing gel ba dang sman dang / nags tshul dang / rdo dang / b+h+yo mo dang / gzigs su sna ba gang dag ji snyed song ba de dag
166a6(mdo sde): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su snang ngo // rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams na mchod pa'i las byin gyis brlab pa'i gzugs kyi rnam pa gang dag yod pa de dag
166a7(mdo sde): kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs cing du gnas par kun tu snang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis gsung gcig tu kye ma tshas kyi me grangs 'anan//
166b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas byin gyis brlabs so// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis
166b2(mdo sde): brlabs pa'o// gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de la bdud thams cad kyis bar char bya bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das gal te gang
166b3(mdo sde): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bdud dpung dang bcas g.yog 'khor dang bcas te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya bar brdzun kyang de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bar chad bya
166b4(mdo sde): bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhen sa ni 'gas kyang srid rgya mtsho thams cad ni skam yang srid/ ri rab thams cad ni rnam par 'thor yang sridarlung ni zhags pas bcing du rung
166b5(mdo sde): yang srid nyi ma zla ba ni sa'i steng du zhung yang srid nam mkha' ni gzugs kyi rnam par bstan du rung yang srid/ me ni chur 'gyur yang srid chu ni mar 'gyur yang srid 'byung
166b6(mdo sde): ba chen po bzhi ni gzhan du 'gyur yang srid sems can thams cad kyi sems ni gcig tu byar rung yang srid nam mkha' dang sa ni 'byar yang srid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
166b7(mdo sde): gyis rlabs ni sus kyang bskyod pa 'am/ g.yo ba 'am 'khrugs par byed mi nus so// zhes gsungs so// rdu la de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i
167a1(mdo sde): spyi bor phyag bzhug ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba nye bar/
167a2(mdo sde): gzung ste/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig/ cho dri shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston cig/
167a3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi dbang gang gzigs na de lta ma lags pa/ rgya mtsho dang rgya
167a4(mdo sde): mtsho chen po ltar gting dpag dka' ba'i dran pa dang / blo rab tu thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag mchis bzhin du dge slong kun dga' bo ci tsha ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa la
167a5(mdo sde): chos kyi le'u 'di lta bu 'di yongs su gtang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa blo gros rgya mtsho dge slong kun dga' bo rang gi blo'i stobs bskyed pas/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di
167a6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa ma yin gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dzin to// blo gros rgya mtsho sems can gang dag dge slong kun dga' bo las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos na/ dga'
167a7(mdo sde): ba dang / dang pa dang / mchog tu dga' ba thob par 'gyur ba yod de/ de dag 'ang sam du/ 'di ca ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi 'di skar than thos kyang 'ang du/
167b1(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di 'dzin cing ston pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ji tsam du bsam gyis mi khyab pa ngo mtshar to snyam du sems par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de ram/
167b2(mdo sde): lha dang mi kha cig 'di snyam du sems te/ ci byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di dran pa dang rab tu ldan pa yin gyi/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa'i mchog tu bstan pa
167b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni de lta ma yin no snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos 'khor de'i sems kyi rnam par rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ 'khor gyi
167b4(mdo sde): sems can rnams la rnam par bltas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho 'di rab tu dran pa dang ldan pa lags
167b5(mdo sde): kyi gang bcom ldan 'das kyis mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ni ma lags samabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od srungs
167b6(mdo sde): gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ sems can ji tsam sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa'i sems can gyi khams ni rab tu mang gi sa'i khams ni de lta ma yin no zhes gang
167b7(mdo sde): de skad du/ bya ba de la ji snyam du sems/ 'od srungs sems can gyi khams de mang ngam/ 'od srungs kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang lags so// bde bar gshegs pa tshad ma mchis so//
168a1(mdo sde): bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa 'od srungs yongs su brtag pa nye bar gzung ste/ sems can de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ de bzhin/
168a2(mdo sde): du ji ltar dge slong kur dga' bo ltar dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs dang yang ldan par gyur kyang / kun dga' bo lta bu'i sems can de dag gi dran pa dang gzungs kyi stobs de ni/ byang chub sems
168a3(mdo sde): dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i dran pa dang / gzungs kyi stobs bskyed pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do// 'od srungs byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
168a4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho ni phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis gsungs pa 'dzin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan pas// de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyis chos
168a5(mdo sde): bstan pa la kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed do// 'od srungs 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgya mtsho chen por shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char pa'i rgyun 'bab pa'i chu'i rgyun gcig
168a6(mdo sde): gis chu'i rgyun gnyis pa la sgrib pa 'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya mi byed de/ chu'i rgyun thams cad kyang rgya mtsho chen pos blangs nas de la 'grib pa 'am gang ba yang med do// 'od
168a7(mdo sde): srungs de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis chos bstan pa kun tu 'dzir kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos bstan
168b1(mdo sde): pas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis kyis chos bstan pa la sgrib pa 'am/ kun nas ldang ba'i bya ba mi byed de/ de'i dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa la bri ba'am gang ba yang med do// bsgyur ba 'di
168b2(mdo sde): bshad par srog chags brgyad stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ chog 'di skad ces bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' blo thos rgya ma
168b3(mdo sde): dran pa'i stobs bskyed pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur cig ces smras so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis lha dang mi'i me tog gis bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
168b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la gtor mngon par gtor to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/
168b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi sgo'i le'u 'di thos nas mos pa dang mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang 'don pa dang / rtog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du na na
168b6(mdo sde): tar bgyis pa de bsod nams ji tsam zhig bskyed par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma bkod pa la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa stong
168b7(mdo sde): chen po yi 'jig rten khams 'di ni// gser gyis bkang ste bde gshegs phul ba bas// gang gis chos kyi mdzod 'di thos nas ni// mos pa'i bsod nams 'di ri khyad par 'phags//
169a1(mdo sde): gang gis 'jig rten khams khri rin chen bkang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas/ gang gis mad sde 'di la 'jug byas pa// bsod nams des
169a2(mdo sde): mas skyed du med// gang gis 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag bcu// rin chen bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa bas// gang gis mdo 'di bton nas stor pa yi// bsod nams de yi char ni snga ma
169a3(mdo sde): min// zhing ni bye ba khrag khrig stong gi rnams// rin chen bkang ste 'jig rten slob dpon skyob// sangs rgyas rnams la dbul bar phul ba bas// gang gis tshul 'dir rab tu sbyor ba dang /
169a4(mdo sde): phyogs bcu rnams su gang ga'i bye snyed zhing // rin che ra bkang ste rgyal la phul ba pas// ji ltar bsta na pa bzhin du gang gnas pa'o// bsod nams de la ma nyam pa yod ma yaun/
169a5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dang chos 'dzir dang // chos bsgrub pa dang srog chags snying rje ba// chos bzhi 'di dag bsod nams mtha' yas te// de dag mtha' ni bde gshegs//
169a6(mdo sde): mo gsung ngo // nam mkha'i khams dang de bzhin sems can khams// sangs rgyas ye shes dang ri byang chub sems// chos bzhi 'di dag dpag tu med pa ste// mkhas pa rnams kyis
169a7(mdo sde): de thos dogs mi bya// dkon mchog chos 'di rab tu bshad pa na// phyogs bcu'i zhing ni bye ba g.yos par gyur// snang ba byung zhing me tog char kyang bab// sil snyan brgya dag ma dkrol
169b1(mdo sde): sgra yang drung / byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa de dag kun// mgu nas ched du rjod pa ched du brjob// chos bstan pa 'di 'dra 'di thos bdag cag rnams// tsha ba don yod rnyed pa legs/
169b2(mdo sde): par rnyed// gang dag 'di 'dra 'di ni thos gyur pa// sems can de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed// gang dag byang chub sems ni mi brjod pa// de dag de bzhin gshegs pas shin tu
169b3(mdo sde): bzung // phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas stong phrag bya ba rnams// phyag ni g.yas pa rab tu brkyang mdzad de// yon tan rgya mtsho'i spyi bor bzhag nas ni/ shAkya seng ges bskul ba legs
169b4(mdo sde): shes gsung // lha dang klu dang lha min mi 'am ci// dri za gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye che// brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// nam mkhar gnas te ched du rjod
169b5(mdo sde): pa brjod// shAkya seng ge 'di dang dge 'dun dang // mdo sde 'di 'dra ba ni 'dzin byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo ring gnas gyur// legs gsungs chos ni gzhar yang
169b6(mdo sde): nub ma gyur// gang dag chos kyi tshul ni 'di 'dzin pa// de dag la ni bdag cag bsnyen bkur bgyi// bdag cag thams cad gus dang bcas par ni// kun tu srung zhing sba ba spro bar
169b7(mdo sde): bgyide nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ blo gros rgya mtsho chos kyi tshul chos kyi phyag rgya chos btus pa chos rab/
170a1(mdo sde): tu rnam par 'byed pa chos rab tu dbye ba 'di ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bshad pa/ 'chad pa
170a2(mdo sde): 'chad par 'gyur ba ste/ blo gros rgya mtsho khyod kyis de la gus pa dang bcas pa dang / zhe sa dang bcas pa dang / sgrub pa snying por bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
170a3(mdo sde): stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tho gros rgya mtsho dang / thams cad dang ldar pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs de dag dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /
170a4(mdo sde): lha dang mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// byin gyis brlabs kyi le'u
170a5(mdo sde): bcu gtses pa'o// 'dus pa chen po'i le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs las/ 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa rdzogs so//
170a6(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzan mo cha dang / d+har shI la dang / prad+d+ha pra b+ha dang / 'u chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he ye shes zhes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang btsas nas gan
170a7(mdo sde): la phab pa/ @rgya gar skad du Ad+ya sA ga rA rA ga rA dza ba ri thaMd tsa nA ma ma hA yA na su tra bod skad du/ 'phags pa
170b1(mdo sde): ku'i rgyal po rgya ma chos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
170b2(mdo sde): bdag gis zos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab ra/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i rI la/ dge slong brgya stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
170b3(mdo sde): te/ byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa gzungs dang ma
170b4(mdo sde): sde rtogs par khong du chud pa sems can thams cad spobs pas mgu bar byed pa/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes ston pa la mkhas pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i
170b5(mdo sde): pha rol tu son pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa la/ snyan
170b6(mdo sde): bar brjod pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ bdud thams cad skrag par bya ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad ji lta
170b7(mdo sde): ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa sems cad thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub
171a1(mdo sde): pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las yang dag par bsgrub pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad
171a2(mdo sde): kyis ma gos pa lus dang / ngagra dang / sems kyi rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po la spro ba'i go cha bgos pa/ bskal pa grang med par
171a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus chen pos yid yongs su mi skyo ba/ seng ge'i sgra chen po bsgrags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi phyag
171a4(mdo sde): rgyas btab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba thob pa khri nyis stong pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhun po dang / ri rab
171a5(mdo sde): dang / lhun po chen po dang / lhun po chen po rtse 'dzin dang / lhun po mar me'i rgyal po dang / lhun po brtsegs dang / lhun po'i rgyal mtshan dang / lhun po'i rgyal po dang /
171a6(mdo sde): ldan po'i rtse mo rdob pa'i rgyal po dang / 'jug sgra dang / dza sra dang / rin rten 'byung gnas dang / rin chen tog dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / rin chen dpal dang / rin chen
171a7(mdo sde): 'byung dang / rin chen 'od dang / rin chen khar ba can dang / rin chen rtse mo dang / lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / rin chen dra ba dang / rin chen bkod pa dang / rin chen 'od 'gro/
171b1(mdo sde): dang / rin chen gling dang / rin chen sgron ma dang / lag na rin chen dang / dga' byed dang / chos la dga' ba bkod pa dang / bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / mtshan gyis yang dag par brgyan
171b2(mdo sde): pa dang / tshig bkod pa'i 'od dang / tshig rnam par dag pa'i 'od dang / gtsug na rin po che dang / lha brtsegs dang / rin chen brtsegs dang / 'od gzer stong ldan dang / me lce
171b3(mdo sde): dang / skar ma la dga' ba dang / zla 'od dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / gser bzangs rnam dge 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
171b4(mdo sde): po rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang / byams pa la sogs pa/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / 'jam dpal la sogs
171b5(mdo sde): pa sems dpa' dpe med drug cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i dbang po brgya
171b6(mdo sde): byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral la sogs pa 'thab bral ba'i lha rnams dang / lnga'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan la sogs pa
171b7(mdo sde): dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang byed la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha
172a1(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha'i bu ded dpon la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dkar po'i phyogs thams cad dang / rab tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'don pa'o//
172a2(mdo sde): lnga rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa tshangs chen gyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal la sogs pa 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dge
172a3(mdo sde): rgyas la sogs pa dge rgyas kyi lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po 'bras bu che la sogs pa 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
172a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnams dang / lha'i rgyal po dri med 'od la sogs pa 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha mi yin gyi dbang po drug khri dang / mi 'am tsa'i rgya
172a5(mdo sde): po ljon pa la sogs pa mi 'am ci bzhi khri cis stong dang / dri za'i rgyal po phreng ba thogs pa la sogs pa dri za sum khri nyis stong dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po/
172a6(mdo sde): bdun khri nyis stong dang / bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding bzhi stong dang / de ma yin pa'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'
172a7(mdo sde): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lo phye chen po gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba song dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor stong bras dums
172b1(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston cing / lha thams cad k+Shi bkod pas legs par brgyan pa'i seng ke 'i khri la/ dri'i rgyal po'i ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas rjen tu 'phags
172b2(mdo sde): pa bzhin du bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ dge slong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor / lham me ldan na/ ltung
172b3(mdo sde): zhing bzhugs so// de nas de ltar 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi nang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar bzhugs pa'i steng gi bar snang la rin po che'i gdugs rin po che thams cad kyi 'od dang
172b4(mdo sde): ldan zhing / rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i gdugs des thams cad dang ldan pa'i gling bzhi pa chen po'i 'jig rten 'di kun tu khebs par gyur to//
172b5(mdo sde): rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang mu tig kha dog du ma'i rgyan 'phreng 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste/ mu tig dkar po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / mu tig dri ma med pa dang / gsar lta
172b6(mdo sde): bu'i mu tigA dang / zla ba lta bu'i mu tig dang / pad+ma lta bu'i mu tig dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i mdog can gyi mu tig rnams 'phyang ngo // mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng de dag las kyang 'od gzer dag kyang
172b7(mdo sde): byung ngo // 'od gzer de dag las kyang / me tog kha dog sna tshogs pa/ kha dog 'bum phrag du ma/ dri zhim pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba dag gi char mngon par bab bo// me/
173a1(mdo sde): tog de dag gis kyang 'khor gyi khyams thams cad pus mo chub pa tsam du gang bar gyur to// bar snang la yang 'brug sgra chen po grags par gyur to// a ga ru dang tsan dar/
173a2(mdo sde): gyi phye ma dag dang / tsan dan dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i phye ma dag gi char yang bab bo// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po stan las
173a3(mdo sde): langs nas/ b+hA gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar te/ pus mo yas pa'i lhu nga sa la barmugs nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
173a4(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i cho 'phrul 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di dag su'i snga ltas lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
173a5(mdo sde): kyis tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu 'di ni klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho de bzhin gshegs pa la ltar 'ong ba de'i snga ltas yin no// bcom
173a6(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshig de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ ring po ma lon par klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos klu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang / klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyis bskor cing mdu
173a7(mdo sde): du bdar // me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thams ca
173b1(mdo sde): dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / klu dbyangs brgya stong dag len cing / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal/
173b2(mdo sde): te/ ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa la sogs pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa
173b3(mdo sde): dang sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa dang / glu dbyangs rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang / gnyen 'dab kyi 'khor
173b4(mdo sde): dang bcas pas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten phan par bzhed pa 'jig rten gyis
173b5(mdo sde): mchod 'jig rten mig sbyin pa// 'jig rten du skyes 'jig rten dri ma rnams kyis ma gos pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin// 'jig rten sna ba rnam par gzigs pa spyan gsum mnga' ba 'jig
173b6(mdo sde): rten bde ba sbyin mdzad pa// 'jig rten nyi ma rkyen la mkhas pa 'jig rten gtso bo khyod la di ring bdag phyag 'tshal// dul zhing dul bas yongs bskor stobs bcu mnga' ba sbyin pa rnams
173b7(mdo sde): dang dul ba rnams kyis 'phags/ 'dren pa nyon mongs rdul dang mun pa dang ni dri ma tha ba bsregs shing myu gu bsregs// snying rjes nor gyi gtso bo bdun po sbyin par mdzad cing sems/
174a1(mdo sde): rnams la byams pas 'phags// bsod nams zhing ste 'jig rten rtswa lag brtan po khyod la bdag ri mag bos phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyi zhal gyi sprir mtshams
174a2(mdo sde): mdzod spu 'bar ba me tog kun da zla ba dung mdog 'dra// 'di na tshangs pa'i gnas na 'khod pa'i lha rnams kyis kyang khyod kyi spyi gtsug mthong mi 'gyur// zla ba lta bu'i zhal nas byung rmed byung
174a3(mdo sde): 'od kyis 'gro ba ma lus snang bar mdzad// de yis reg par gyur pa'i dbang gis mtshams med sems can rnams kyang bde ba nyid du 'gyur// khyod kyi gsung ni shin tu yid 'ong tshig ste zla
174a4(mdo sde): pa bzhin du yid kyang tshim par bgyid// lha dang mi yaM sgra skad zil gyis gnon cing gcig tu nges par dag la gtsang ba ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa rdul rnams rab tu zhi bar bgyid cing shes/
174a5(mdo sde): rabags pa par bgyid// dga' dang mgu bgyi bde ba shin tu skyed par bgyid ci thar pa yang dag ston pa lags// khyod kyi ye shes dus gsum gtogs pa thogs pa ma mchis kar yang chags
174a6(mdo sde): pa ma mchis te/ khyod kyis sems can rnams kyi spyod po chung dang 'bring dang dam pa ma lus thugs su chud// gang dag gi ni dbang po bsam pa dag dang 'gro dang thar pa tha dad ci 'dra ba/
174a7(mdo sde): thams cad khyod kyis skad cig tsam gyis thugs su chud pas dge slong khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdzogs pa'i byang chub shing rgyal drung du glags lha'i phyir brtson bdud rnams bye ba brgya phrag snyed/
174b1(mdo sde): khyod kyi thad du lpags par gyur kyang gnas las ma g.yos thugs brtser ldan pa'i tho mnga' ba/ mnga' bdag khyod kyis bden dang brtul zhugs dpal dang yon tan rnams dang byams pas pham
174b2(mdo sde): par mdzad// de slad mi rnams su zhig deng 'dir khyod la mchod pa'i slad du khyod la ngoms par 'dzin// mnga' bdag khyod kyis chos rnams byed pa med dang ya ma brla dang zla ba 'dra ba dang
174b3(mdo sde): dbu ba glog sprin chu yi chu bur 'dra zhing sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur thugs su chud// gang la rgyu med rtog pa mi 'byung khyod kyi chos de dag ni rtag tu bdag med de// de ltar 'gro ba'i 'dod pa lnga skyed mdzad
174b4(mdo sde): pas mnga' bdag khyod ni thar pa lags par 'os// gang gi don tu bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por dka' ba rnams ni bstan pa dang // gang gi don tu rtag tu 'gro la phan mdzad 'dren pa rnams la
174b5(mdo sde): mchod pa mdzad pa dang // gang gi don tu sbyin dang yang dag sdom dang dul dang bzod pa rtag tu bsten pa yi// rnam 'dren khyod kyi spor lam chen po shin tu rmad du byung ba de ni rdzogs par gyur/
174b6(mdo sde): de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'thun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te
174b7(mdo sde): zhus na zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la
175a1(mdo sde): phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis kwa'i rgyal po rgya mtshol 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kwa'i bdag po khyod/
175a2(mdo sde): ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / ngas dri ba dris pa de dang de lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri ba lung bstar
175a3(mdo sde): pa'i skabs phye nas bcom ldan 'das la klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang
175a4(mdo sde): dag par chad pa dang / mi khom pa brgyad las 'das pa dang / lha dang mi'i skye bar 'gro ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams rtag tu rdzun mi 'chad par
175a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong ba thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gA can dang byung ba dang 'tshang ba'i yulu du gnas 'thob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems/
175a6(mdo sde): dpa' rnams dad pa dang dang ba'i shas che ba dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton pa dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs pa
175a7(mdo sde): lags bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos 'tshal ba dang / chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba dang /
175b1(mdo sde): thos pa tshal bas chog ma 'chal ba dang / thos pa bsgrub pas mngon par 'phags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltaran byang chub sems dpa' ram rab tu 'byung ba la mos pa
175b2(mdo sde): dang nags dang nags pa dab na chub dang / 'phags pa'i rigs dang sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsrungs pa la mngon par dga' ba dang / rab tu byung ba'i don tan rnams yongs su
175b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji lar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos zab mo'i tshul la gnas pa dang / chad pa dang rtag par lta ba yongs su sangs pa
175b4(mdo sde): dang rgyu dang rkyen gyi chos rnams la zhugs pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad bral ba lags bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par shes pa'i
175b5(mdo sde): ye shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes mthong ba lags bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can gyi
175b6(mdo sde): spyod pa dang bsam pa dang / cho ga 'tshal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang gzung ba dang /
175b7(mdo sde): klog pa dang brda sprod pa la mkhas pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa dang / skrag pa dang
176a1(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa lags bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyir mi
176a2(mdo sde): ldog pa'i chos la yang dag par gzhol ba dang / bzod pa thob pa dang / lung bstan po thob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi klu'i rgyal po
176a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po legs so legs so// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri bar sems pa ni klu'i bdag po khyod legs so//
176a4(mdo sde): kwa'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yod la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsolaklu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho bcom
176a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldanar 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
176a6(mdo sde): ngar 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba'i sems med pa dang
176a7(mdo sde): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs nas thams cad srung ba dang / gzhan gyi nyes pa mi gleng zhing brtad par mi byed pa dang / bdag gi 'khrul pa la rtog par byed
176b1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi 'khrul pa la ma rtog sa klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngan 'gro dang / ngan song thams cad yang dag par chad par
176b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi lom pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dkon mchog
176b3(mdo sde): gsum po 'di lta s+ho/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog gi bsngags pa rgyun tu brjod pa dang / chos 'dod pa rnams
176b4(mdo sde): g.yengs par mi byed pa dang / gzhan dag gi 'gyod pa mi skyed pa dang / sems can 'gyod cing 'dug pa rnams kyi 'gyod pa sel ba ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan
176b5(mdo sde): nabyang chub sems dpa' rnams mi khom pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lnga dang mi'i skye bar 'gro bar
176b6(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong zhing gzhan dag la yang sgrogs pa dang / tshul khrims yang dag par blangs pa mi gtong zhing nyams par/
176b7(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang / smon lam la bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de dag la snying rje chen po skyed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag
177a1(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams lnga dang mi'i skye bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan nu/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
177a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su drar pa yid la byed pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur dang /
177a3(mdo sde): mchod pa byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsngags pa rgyun tu brjod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba la
177a4(mdo sde): sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa thos pa der skye bar smon lam 'debs pa dang rgyu de zhum pa med cing rgya chen po la
177a5(mdo sde): mos pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos brgyad po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
177a6(mdo sde): klu'i bdag po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sgyu
177a7(mdo sde): med pa dang / g.yo med par bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos la gces pa dang / gus pa dang ri mo byed pa dang / dka' blo bde zhing gso sla la nges pa dang / nga rgyal med cing
177b1(mdo sde): sri 'u byed pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dge ba'i bshes garten rnyed par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub sems/
177b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams 'tsham po'i yul du gnas pa thob par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ mi brlang zhing gya gyu med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang zag dog dang / ser
177b3(mdo sde): bsal ba dang / gzhan dag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang bde bar sbyar ba la dga' ba ste/ klu'i bdag po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan ra byang chub sems dpa'
177b4(mdo sde): rnams 'tsham pa'i yul du gnas pa thob par 'gyur ro// kwa'i bdag po chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur te/ lnga po gang zhen/ 'di
177b5(mdo sde): lta ste/ mos pa'i stobs dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa'i stobs dang / byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba'i stobs
177b6(mdo sde): dang / chos nyid la rton pa'i stobs te klu'i bdag po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnam dad pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos
177b7(mdo sde): gnyis dang ldan na/ dga' ba'i shas che bar 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rgyu'i stobs dang / yang dag par sbyor ba'i stobs te/
178a1(mdo sde): ku'i bdag po chos de gnyis wa ra byang chub sems dpa' rnams dga' ba'i shas che bar 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po chos gsum dang
178a2(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la rton par 'gyur te/ gsum po gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ bdag med pa la
178a3(mdo sde): mos pa dang / bzod pa'i stobs dang yang dag pa'i las legs par rtsom pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
178a4(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams las kyi rnam par smin pa la ljon par 'gyur ro// !/ klu'i bdag po chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi dge pa'i chos thams
178a5(mdo sde): cad spangs nas/ dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bogs par 'gyur te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ phung po gsum gyi yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa
178a6(mdo sde): dang bag yod par gnas pa ste/ de gnyis so// gzhan yang gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rang bzhin du gyur pa dang / rnam par smin pa la mi
178a7(mdo sde): re ba ste/ klu'i bdag po chos de gnyis dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs nas dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis 'bog
178b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur/ klu'i bdag po chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs don
178b2(mdo sde): du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / sgra don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / dri don du gcer ba ma yin pa dang / ro don du gcer ba ma yin dang reg bya don du gcer bya ma yin pa sa/
178b3(mdo sde): lnga po ni de dag yin no// klu'i bdag po gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yin te/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta
178b4(mdo sde): chos don du gcer ba yin gyi/ lus dron du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / yon tar dor du gnyer ba yin gyi/ srog don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / shes rab don du gnyer ba
178b5(mdo sde): yin gyi/ reg pa don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang / dge ba don du gnyer ba yin gyi/ tshor ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa dang sems can yongs su bskyab pa don du gnyer ba yin
178b6(mdo sde): gyi bdag gi bde ba don du gnyer ba ma yin pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos don du gnyer ba yin no// klu'i bdag po chos
178b7(mdo sde): drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod pa yin te/ drug po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rab tu byung ba'i yon tan 'dod kyi/ gos tshon can gyi rtags 'dzin
179a1(mdo sde): pa tsam 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / chos nyan pa 'dod kyi/ 'jig rten rgyang 'ber ba'i gsang tshig nyan 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / chos bstar pa 'dod kyi/ 'jig
179a2(mdo sde): rten gyi zang zing 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / chos la so sor rtog pa 'dod kyi/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed par 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / chos sgrub pa 'dod kyi/ yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig
179a3(mdo sde): dang brda yongs su tshol ba 'dod pa ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos nyan pa 'dod kyi nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa ma yin pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos drug po de dag dang
179a4(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos 'dod pa yin no// klu'i bdag po chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba yin te/
179a5(mdo sde): brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems kyi gtam la dga'i theg pa dman pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po'i gtam la dga'i phyin ci log gi gtam/
179a6(mdo sde): la ma yin pa dang / chos kyi lugs kyi gtam la dga'i 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid kyi gtam la dga'i 'khor ba bcad pa'i
179a7(mdo sde): gzham la ma yin pa dang / zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chen cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i gtam la dga'i bdag tus pa 'dzin pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang chos bdag mang ba'i
179b1(mdo sde): rang bzhin dang rkyen rnam par dag pa'i gtamal dka'/ chad pa dang / rtag pa dang / bdag dang sems can dang / thog dung skyes du dang gang zag tu/
179b2(mdo sde): 'dzin pa'i gtam la ma yin pa dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i gtam yang dag pa ji lta ba la dga'i dmigs par lto ba'i gtam la ma yin pa
179b3(mdo sde): dang / rab tu byung ba la dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas zhing gi rgyan bkod pa'i gtam la dga'i zhi ba la btang snyoms su byed pa'i gtam la ma yin pa ste/ klu'i
179b4(mdo sde): bdag po brgyad po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi kun dga' la dga' bas dga' ba yin no// klu'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni/ don
