295b4(mdo sde): mnyam par 'os pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/ yid ches pa'i tshig tu 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa no/ the tshom thams cad gcod pa la mkhas par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po
295b5(mdo sde): brnab sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spyod mi 'phrogs pa dang / longs spyod dang / yongs su spyod pa rje chen po la de'i sems 'gro bar
295b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / rgya chen po la mos shing dbang che bar grags par 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po gnod sems spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa byin na//
295b7(mdo sde): longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ longs spong mi 'phrogs pa dang / mdzes pa dang / skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang / thogs pa med
296a1(mdo sde): pa sno / yogs pa med pa mams dang / nga pos sasaso// bdag ga cang chu gyur
296a2(mdo sde): chung bar yurayongs spyon mi 'ardzogs pa dang mas rgyas la dang rnying yang dag pa lta ba'i tshum ba'o// chung chub ba snang brjod par dang / da/
296a3(mdo sde): zer ba dang / dge 'dun la bskor babar byed pa dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// kwa'i bdag po de ltar dag pa brgya las kyi lapa 'di dag phyir pas sar
296a4(mdo sde): 'byor pa chen por 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag nyid tshul khrims kyis brgyar na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi don tu smon pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// dge ba bcu'i
296a5(mdo sde): las kyi lam 'di dag nyid bzod pas brgyar ma/ mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po dang / sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du sbyar te/ brjor 'grus kyis brgyan
296a6(mdo sde): na bdud phyir rgol pa bcol bu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bsam gtan gyi brgyar nA/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / dras
296a7(mdo sde): ba yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyis brgyad ra/ lta ba ngan pa thams cad yang dag par 'joms par 'gyur ro// byams pas brgyan na/ sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i
296b1(mdo sde): sems su 'gyur ro// snying rjes brgyan du/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar 'gyur ro// dka' bas brgya na/ zhum pa med pa'i sems su 'gyur ro// btang snyoms kyis brgyar
296b2(mdo sde): na rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// bsdu ba'i dngos pos brgyan na/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur ro// dran pa nye bar gzhag pas brgyan
296b3(mdo sde): na/ lus dang / tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos la mkhas par 'gyur ro// yang dag par spong bas brgyan na/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs
296b4(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas brgyar na/ lus dang sems yang bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas brgyan na/ dad pa brtan pa dang / brtson 'grus 'bar ba dang / rmongs pa med pa dang //
296b5(mdo sde): sems las su rung ba la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba la mkhas par 'gyur ro// stobs kyis brgyan na/ rdzi ba med cing dbul ba dang / nyes pa thams cad 'joms
296b6(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi yar lag gis brgyar na/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin khong du chud par 'gyur ro// lam gyis brgyar ra/ yang dag pa'i ye shes 'grub par gyur ro//
296b7(mdo sde): zhi gnas kyis brgyar ra/ nyon mongs pa thams cad 'jom par 'gyur ro// lhag mthong gis brgyar na/ chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud pa'i shes rab dang ye shes su
297a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// thabs kyis brgyan ra/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos bde ba thob par 'gyur ro// ku ri bdag po mdor ra/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag gis stobs/
297a2(mdo sde): bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi thos dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar dag thob pa yongs su rdzogs par
297a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// klu'i bdag po de bas na dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag rgya cher rnam par dbye bas/ brgyan pa'i phyir brtson par gyis shig/ klu'i bdag po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sal gnas pa'i
297a4(mdo sde): grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dung / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor thams cad dang / rtswa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang nags tshal thams cad dang / las
297a5(mdo sde): kyi mtha' thams cad dang / sa bon gyi tshogs thams cad dang / 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad dang / lo tog thams cad skyed pa dang / rmo brko ba bya ba 'byung de dag gi gnas ni sa yin no// klu'i
297a6(mdo sde): bdag po de bzhin du dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang lha dang / mir skye ba'i rten to// slob pa dang mi skyob pa'i 'bras bu brnyed pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /
297a7(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi chen yin pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar gyi rten yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka'
297b1(mdo sde): phral nas ka kwa'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lta ba yin dang / dri bar
297b2(mdo sde): bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi dngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pakra'i rgyal po rgya maros rus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
297b3(mdo sde): mdo che ba'i rang ras bkol bar snang ngo // rgya gar gyi mkhan po 'dzin mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang / mu ni bar ma dang / zhu cher gyi lo tsa ba bar d+he ye shes sde la sogs
297b4(mdo sde): pas bsgyur cing lus te/ skad gsar gcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la bab pa/ @rgya gar skad du/ Arar+ya sA kar rA ga ra dza ba ri brid/
297b5(mdo sde): tshA nA ma me hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho lus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
297b6(mdo sde): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas na/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub
297b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho la bka' stsal pa/ klu'i bdag po ches
298a1(mdo sde): #kyi mdo bzhi po chos kyi mdo 'di dag brjod na/ gang dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'du byed thabs
298a2(mdo sde): cad mi rtag par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad sdug bsngal bar byang chub sems dpa' sems
298a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa dang / chos thams cad bdag med par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab
298a4(mdo sde): papa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa zhi bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bstan pa mi zad pa'i shes pa rab tu 'jug pa ste/ klu'i bdag po chos kyi mdo bzhi po 'di dag brjod pas chos kyi phung po/
298a5(mdo sde): brgyad khri bzhi stong brjod par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag yi rangs te// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod/
298a6(mdo sde): do// 'phags pa klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+he dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban b+hes ye shes sdes bsgyur cing
298a7(mdo sde): zhus te gtan la phab pa/ @rgya gar skang du/ sar+ya tsan dro d+ha dadA ri kaSh+ka kar Na na ma ma ga yAn sA tra/ bod skad du 'phags pa bu mo zla mchog grang
298b1(mdo sde): bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
298b2(mdo sde): yangs pa can na tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dgra bcom pa lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa bya ba byas pa byed pa byas pa
298b3(mdo sde): khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa// srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa
298b4(mdo sde): sha swA ga dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' brkyang stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa/ spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ ting
298b5(mdo sde): nge 'dzin thob pa/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ tshig thogs pa med pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa// khagasag med pa shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i sems dang bral ba
298b6(mdo sde): zang zing med par chos ston pa/ chos zab mo la bzod pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi
298b7(mdo sde): sgrib pa spangs pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la the tsom med pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par smon lam shin tu brtsams pa bzhin 'dzum pa
299a1(mdo sde): gnyer med pa/ tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smra ba la mkhas pa/ sems yongs su ma gtugs pa/ spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/ chos mnyam pa nyid la bzod
299a2(mdo sde): bzod pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa/ tshig gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gcig tu ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ 'das pa
299a3(mdo sde): dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
299a4(mdo sde): smon pa med pa dang / dben pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur mos pa/ shes rab dang ye shes tshad med pa la mkhas pa/ sems can thams
299a5(mdo sde): cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/ sems thogs pa med pa/ chos la sred pa dang bral ba/ nye ba'i nyon mongs
299a6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ chos ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i yon tan bkod pa yongs su zin pa/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran
299a7(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par rgyun tu mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa shes pa la mkhas pa/ kun nas ldang ba dang / lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang /
299b1(mdo sde): bag la nyal sna tshogs spong ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa sha stug la 'di lta ste/ byung
299b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / sman ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob dang / 'byung dkara' dang / spos kyi glang po che dang brjod
299b3(mdo sde): pa mi gtong dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang / spos kyi 'od gaper rab tu gtong ba dang / 'brug sgra dang / 'od gzer rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po dang / sreng
299b4(mdo sde): med kyi bu dang / lag na rin po che dang / lag na phyag rgya ri po che dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / snang ba'i rgyal po dang / mthong dga' dang / sems can sgrol dang / rtag tu brtson dang
299b5(mdo sde): rtag tu dgod dga' dbang po dang / ngan song spong dang / rdo rje'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas rnam par gnod pa dang / mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnod
299b6(mdo sde): ba dang / mthong ba don yod dang / dpal gyi snying po dang / pad+ma'i dpal dang / ba glang spos kyi glang po che dang / spobs pa zab mo dang / spobs pa chen po dang / chos 'phags dang /
299b7(mdo sde): chos kyi rang bzhin the tsom med gyur dang / seng ge'i stabs su 'gro ba dang / 'jig pa kun sel dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / seng ge chen po mngon par sgrogs pa'i
300a1(mdo sde): swA dang / brjod mer dang / spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad
300a2(mdo sde): stong dang yang thabs cig go de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po rnams dang / sna chen po la gtogs pa rnams dang / grong khyer dang ljongs kyi mi rnams dang / zhabs 'bring
300a3(mdo sde): gzhug ma rnams dang / bram ze dang / rgyal rigs dang / khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur stir byas bla mar byas/ ri mor byas/ mchod par byas te/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na
300a4(mdo sde): rgyal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so// de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi grong khyer cher po na/ l-i tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba/ drug pa nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba longs
300a5(mdo sde): spyod mang ba/ mdzod dang bang ba mnga' zhig gnas te/ de la chung ma dri med ma zhes bya ba mdzes pa blta na sdug pa kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ zla ba dgu 'das pa dang /
300a6(mdo sde): do las bu mo gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa blta na sdug pa yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad legs par rdzogs pa zhig btsas so// bu mo de btsas ma thag tu khyim de thams cad snang
300a7(mdo sde): ba cheran pos khyab par gyur cing / sa chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur phyi rol gyi sgo khang gi wa dag las kyang mar khu dang 'bru bar dag rab tu 'dzag cing zhar pa dang mgon med pa dang / bkren
300b1(mdo sde): pa dang sdug phongs pa gang yin pa dag ci bder yongs su spyod do// yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na rnga bo che dang rdza rnga dang / khar dza dang / sil snyan dang / reg rdob pa gang yin pa de thams cad
300b2(mdo sde): kyang ma brdungs par sba 'byin par gyur cing / me tog gi char chen po dag kyang rab tu bab par gyur khyim gyi grwa bzhir yang rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu gang ba'i gter chen po ba'i byung zhing kha bye
300b3(mdo sde): ste/ kun tu sdang bar gyur to// bu mo de btsas pa thag tu dru skad mi 'byin cing mchi ma mi glog la/ lhag par yang sor mo bcu thal mo sbyar te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
300b4(mdo sde): sdig las byas pas 'jir ni gtsang ma yin// lus su me ste yid du 'ong bar mir// sdig las byas pas 'dir ni longs spyod dag/ 'byor pa'i khyim rnams su yang mi skye'o// spyir du la yang
300b5(mdo sde): dag sdom dang bag yod cing / gus dang bcas par bla ma bsnyer bkur ba'i// gya nom rang bzhin las kyis rtag tu ni// longs spyod bdag nyid chen po'i khyim du 'grub// 'dren pa rgyal ba 'od
300b6(mdo sde): srungs bsod snyoms phyir// yangs pa can gyi grong du zhugs pa na// bdag gis khang bzangs steng nas mthong gyur cing // mthong nas der ni bdag yid dang ba dran// de tshe bdag yid rab tu
300b7(mdo sde): rang gyur na// bdag la me tog med cing byug pa med// phye ma spos med zas dang skom med pas// ston pa 'di la cis mchod bya snyams sems// de nas bdag gis sgra thos sangs rgyas ni// 'gre
301a1(mdo sde): ba dgrol phyir zang zing med spyod cing / 'jig rten brtso phyir thugs rje bskyed nas ni// sangs rgyas bsod snyoms skad du 'jig rten brgyan// gal te rgyal ba de
301a2(mdo sde): ngadag mchod 'don ma// sangs rgyas nyid phyir khyod kyis smon lam thob// byang chub sems bskyed brtan gyur gang yin pa// de las lhag mchod srid pa gsum na med// bar snang sgra thos de
301a3(mdo sde): nas bdag gis ni// mtshan mchog spras pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba dang // byang chub phyir ni mi g.yo yid skyes nas// khang pa de nas rab kyi lus mchongs te// bar snang tal srid la 'dus
301a4(mdo sde): nas ni// phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang // de bzhin rgyal ba 'od srungs de yi sku// rin chen ri dang lhun po 'dra ba mthong // rgyal ba'i mthus ni bdag gi lag mthil du/
301a5(mdo sde): man da ra ba'i phur mche byung zhing // de dag bdag gis 'od srungs gtor ba dang / me tog gdugs su gyur nas mkha' la gnas// gang dag phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa/ #
301a6(mdo sde): gyis sku brgyad de dag bltas na yang // ji ltar 'od srungs stong na 'dug pa ltar// de dag la yang me tog gdugs nyid snang // mkha' la gnas bzhin bdag gis tshig smras pa// bskal pa chu
301a7(mdo sde): rdul snyed du spyad bya zhing // byang chub ma thob bdag phyir mi ldog gis// bdag ni sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtsor gyur cig/ bdag gi seng ge'i nga ro de thos nas// de tshe stong phrag bcu gnyis tshang ba
301b1(mdo sde): yi lnga mi lha min gnod sbyin rin po rnams// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog la yang dag zhugs// thos nas sum cu rtsa gsum lhar skyes shing // las bzang byas pa chung zar ma gyur pas/
301b2(mdo sde): de nas shi 'phos 'dzam gling 'dir 'ongs kyis// de phyir skye bo rnams kyis bsod nams byos// gang tshe sum cu rtsa gsum gnas gyur pa// de tshe bdag gis rgyal ba shAka thub mchod/
301b3(mdo sde): bdag ni 'dod dang longs spyod lus mi gnyer// rgyal ba yong dang yang du mchod par bya// bdag gis bsod nams rnam smin de mthong zhing // nyin gcig 'dra bar tshe rabs brgya yang dran// bdag
301b4(mdo sde): 'dir skyes pa'i dpal yang 'di 'dra ra// mkhas pa su zhig rgyal la gus mi skyed// de nas bu mo des tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ cang mi zer bar 'dug par gyur to//
301b5(mdo sde): de'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i 'bras bu'i rgyu 'thun pas lus la lha'i gos rin po che dag gon bzhin du byung bar gyur nas/ de'i lus las zla ba las shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i 'od gzer
301b6(mdo sde): gser gyi mdog du snang ba dag kyang byung ngo // de nas pha ma dag gis de'i ming zla mchog ces bya bar btags so// de nas bu mo zla mchog de skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam gcig gis 'di lta ste
301b7(mdo sde): dper na/ bu mo lo brgyad lon pa lta bu'i na tshod du kun tu snang ngo // des sa'i phyogs gang dang gang dag tu 'grengs pa dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / mal bcas par gyur pa de dang
302a1(mdo sde): de dag tu 'od gzer gser gyi mdog lhu bu dgu snang bar gyur to// de'i khru'i khung bu thams cad nas tsan dan sa mchog dri dag dang / kha nas kyang ut+pa la sngon po'i dri
302a2(mdo sde): dang byung bar gyur to// de nas yang ba can gyi tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang rgyal bu rnams dang / de las gzhan pa rigs che ba dang / rigs mtho bdag gis
302a3(mdo sde): bu mo zla mchog gi lus kyi gzugs dang / kha dog yongs su rdzogs pa thos so// thos nas kyang 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems shin tu bkris par gyur cing / so so nas 'di snyam du sems te
302a4(mdo sde): de bdag gi chu gyur na ci ma rung snyam mo// de na skye bo phal po che rnams de thob par bya ba'i phyir sems brtson par gyur te/ de dag las kha cig ni li tsa byi dri ma med par grags pa la sten par byed bsten par
302a5(mdo sde): byed cing / bsnyen bkur byed par gyur to// kha T+wA~Mg ni nor bu dang / gser dang / dngum dang / rdo rje dang / bai DUr+ya dang / spug dang / an da rnyil dang / dung dang / man shel dang ka 'o gas/
302a6(mdo sde): b+hai ru bye ma skyed dag sbyin zhing 'dod pa skyed par byed do// kha cig ni nor dang / 'bru dang / khyim dang / longs spyod dang / kha zas dag sbyor bar byed do// kha cig ri bur dang bran mo dang / las/
302a7(mdo sde): mi dang / zho shas 'tshe ba dag la gsad pa dang bcing ba dang brdeg pa la sogs pa dag gis 'jigs pa ston par byed do// kha cig ni li tsa byi dri ma med par grags la 'di skad ces zer te/ gal
302b1(mdo sde): te khyod kho bo cag la bu mo rtswa mchog 'bul bar mi byed na/ de phyir khyod la des sdug bsngal 'byung bar bya zhing / khyod la gnod pa chen po yang bya'o zhes zer ro// de nas li tsa byi dri ma
302b2(mdo sde): med par grags pa 'di snyam du/ ma la dpung dag lhags nas bdag bzung zhing bcom ste/ bu mo yang phrogs la bdag kyang srog dang phral bar mi gyur grang snyam nas/ skrag cing sngangs la sgyid lug
302b3(mdo sde): cing / spu zing zhes byed par gyur nas/ de dran pa nyams shing bzhin gyi srog shi la/ rab tu ngu zhing mchi ma blags te/ mig mi 'dzums par bu mo zla mchog la lha'o// bu mo zla mchog gis rang gi
302b4(mdo sde): pha ngu zhing yi shi la/ gdong mchi mas yog cing yul yul por gyur pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de la 'di skad ces smras so// yab ci'i slad du 'di ltar ba shums shing bshums mo dag rab
302b5(mdo sde): tu klog par mdzad lags/ de nas li tsa byo dri ma med par grags pas bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'di ltar khyod dbrog cing khyod kyi phyir grong khyer thams cad du
302b6(mdo sde): thab mo dang rtsod pa dag kunar tu byung bar khyod kyis mi shes sam/ de'i phyir dpung dag lhags shing bcom ste/ khyod phrogs par mi 'gyur grang snyam nas de nas mchi ma byung ba yin mod//
302b7(mdo sde): de nas bu mo zla mchog gos rang gi phal tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ gal te 'dzam gling sems can thams cad dag/ sred med bu 'dra'i brtson 'grus thob gyur cing // de dag mtshon thogs
303a1(mdo sde): bdag slad rgyug gyur kyang / de dag rnams kyis bdag gzhom rngo mo thog/ byams sems ldan la dug dang mtshon mi tshugs// ro langs dang ni 'jigs pa gzhan mi 'byung // @/
303a2(mdo sde): sems za ba zhe sdang ma mchis pas// byams pa'i sems la gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur// yab bdag 'jig rten dag la byams pa ni// ngan bu bdag bzhin bkrol dga' bar gnas// nam yang
303a3(mdo sde): gzhan la sdug bsngal ma bgyis pas/ de phyir ngan bu sdug bsngal mi 'gyur yab// chags bral nam yang 'dod chags ma mchis shing // byams pa yongs bsgoms zhe sdang mchis ma lags
303a4(mdo sde): bdag la chags sdang gti mug ma mchis te// de phyir ngan bu gzhan gyis mi thub yab// yab dang sum la byams pa mchis pa ltar// 'gro ba kun la rgyur tu bdag de bzhin// ya ba gang 'dzag
303a5(mdo sde): rkyen dag la de 'dra re byams// de ni rnams kyang gzhan gyis gnod mi 'gyur// nam mkhas dogs 'dzin par bgyid gyur cing // lhun po yungs 'bru'i ninang du gnas gyur tam/ rgya mtsho chen
303a6(mdo sde): po gnag rjes zhugs gyur kyang // bdag 'joms bgyid par rngo thog ma mchis yab/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas rang gi pha ma la 'di skad
303a7(mdo sde): ces smras so// yang yum de'i srad du/ 'di ltar deng ras dgung bdun ra/ bu mo skra mchog phyir 'byung bar 'gyur zhing byung nas kyang rang gang 'dod pa'i khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur gyi/ de khyed
303b1(mdo sde): gis bsgrib par bya 'ang / lam grang dang ba ni mdo dang sum mdo phyogs thams cad kyang rgyar dag gis brgyan par bya 'ang / me tog dang / bdug spyos dang / spos dang me tog 'drung dang
303b2(mdo sde): byug pa'i mchog dag gis kyang byi dor gyis shig ces shul po che dang / ba'i mdo dang / sum mdo thams cad du dril dkrol zhing sgra bsgrag tu gsol/ de nas bu mo lnga mchog
303b3(mdo sde): gi pha ma gnyis rang gi khyim ras byung ste/ 'di skad du deng nas zhag bdun ma/ bu mo zla mchog phyir 'byung bar 'gyur zhing byung nas kyang / mo ro gang 'dod pa'i phyir khyim thab 'dam par 'gyur gyis
303b4(mdo sde): der khyer cag gis bsgrim par bya zhing / lam srang dang bzhi mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs thams cad rgyan dag gis brgyan par bya zhing / me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog
303b5(mdo sde): 'phreng dang / byug pa'i cho ga dag gis kyang byi dor gyis shig ces rang bzhin de dag kun tu bsgrags so// de skad so sor thos pa dang / yangs pa can gyi skye bo phal po che rnams 'di ltar rang rang gi
303b6(mdo sde): lam srang dang bani mdo dang / sum mdo'i phyogs dag brgyan par bya ba la brtson par gyur cing / sems la 'di snyam du cis kyang bu mo zla mchog ni bdag la 'dzir gyi/ gzhan dag la ni ma yin grang
303b7(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ de dag phan tshun 'gran pas rang rang rgyan par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ tshong dpon dang / khyim bdag dang / zhang lon dang / bram ze dang / rgyal bu rnams dang / las mi'i
304a1(mdo sde): bar dag kyang shin tu khrus byas shing lus legs par zhugs te/ gos bzang po bgos shing / rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus brgyan nas/ rang rang gi g.yog 'khor
304a2(mdo sde): rnams la khyed cag sgrims shig/ gal te bu mo zla mchog 'o bu cag gi gan du rang mi 'ong ba lta na/ de'i phyir mthus drongs la phrogs shig ces skul bar byed do// de ltar zhag bdun 'das pa
304a3(mdo sde): dang / skye bo phal po che dag ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/ bu mo zla mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog nyi ma drug pa la b+hA ba nya ba'i tshe/ gso
304a4(mdo sde): sbyong yan lag brgyad pa yang blangs te mtshan mo mo nyal tsam nA steng gi khang bzangs kyi theg na 'chag cing 'dug go/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo ka mchog gi lag pa
304a5(mdo sde): g.yas par pad+ma sdong bu ni gser/ 'dab ma ni dngul/ ze ba ni bai n+d+har+ya/ snying po ni rdo snying po las byas pa 'dab ma 'bum phrag du ma yod pa/ blta na sdug pa 'od gsal ba zhig byung bar gyur
304a6(mdo sde): pad+ma de'i snying po'i dbus na de bzhir gshegs pa'i sku sku mdog gser 'dra la/ gzi brjid 'bar ba/ 'od kyis sdang bar mdzad pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis
304a7(mdo sde): sku legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs mdzes par byas pa/ skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa zhig kyang byung bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i 'od kyis
304b1(mdo sde): khyim de thams cad snang bas gsal bar gyur to// de nas bu mo b+hU mchog gis pad+ma de mthong zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mthong ba dang / dga' zhing mgul yi rangs
304b2(mdo sde): te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la tshigs su bcud de gsol pa/ 'di 'dra'i dpal dang ldan pa khyod// ci lags lha'am 'or te gu/
304b3(mdo sde): lha min gsang ba mi 'am ci// su lags dris pa nges par gsungs// khyod sku gser mdog 'od gsal ba'i// tshad ni dmigs su ma mchis te// skad cig mdog gser bcod ka dang / mur
304b4(mdo sde): bar shel 'od 'dra bar gda'// ngan bu srad chad lus kyi ni// 'du shes pa mchis sems mi g.yo// mgon po khyod kyi sku mthong nas// bdag ni dga' ba yangs pa skyes// khyod sku dpal 'a
304b5(mdo sde): me 'dra zhing // ri las ri bzhin mdzes 'phags pa// ji ltar gzung zhing rab tu gnas// gang nas 'dir byon gang du gshegs/ de ras de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku des
304b6(mdo sde): bu mo zla mchog la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ nga ni lha mir klu yang min// mi 'am ci min gnod sbyin min// sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge yis// nga ni khyod kyi gan du gtang // nga ni
304b7(mdo sde): lha mir gnod sbyin min// klu min mi 'am ci ma yin// chos byung ba deng khyod kyi phyir// lha mi 'dul bas bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de la bu mo zla mchog gis
305a1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba// de mdog ci 'dra 'dir gsung la// de yi rtags dang dbyibs gsungs dang // de thos bdag gis
305a2(mdo sde): rtordzogs par 'gyur// khyod 'dir sangs rgyas mtshan gsungs na// de'i mdog rtogs dang dbyibs mi gsung // sangs rgyas rung spyod gang dang mthu// mi mnyam mdzad spobs 'dir gsungs
305a3(mdo sde): shig de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku des// bu mo zla mchog la phyir tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ de ri sku mdog gser 'dra zhing // mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis
305a4(mdo sde): mnga'// sems can kun gyi mchod rten te// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// byed ldan sems can rnams kyi ni// spyod pa mchog dang dman pa dag/ thugs gcig gis ni rtogs mdzad de//
305a5(mdo sde): phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// chos kun rnam pa thams cad du// des ni mi mkhyen cung zad med// ye shes kun gyi pha rol byor// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// des ni sems can kun
305a6(mdo sde): gyi sems// thugs gcig gis ni rtog gyur kyang // kun gyi sems la nam du yang // rlom pa mi mnga' gzhan du na// sangs rgyas spyod pa sbyin pas 'phags// tshul khrims spyod pas mthor 'phags
305a7(mdo sde): shig/ bzod dang brtson pas mngon 'phags la// bsam gtan shes rab yang dag 'phags// bzo rnams thams cad legs bslabs pas// des ni mi mkhyen cung zad med// byams dang
305b1(mdo sde): thugs rje phur sum tshogs// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// gang gis bla med 'khor lo yi// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor cing // zhing rnams bye ba rnam rig la// bdag med rab tu bas/
305b2(mdo sde): mdzad cing // gang gis sangs rgyas zhing stong dang // brgya dang khrag khrig snyed rnams dag/ ljags kyis rab tu khyab mdzad pa// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// zhing rnams bye ba stong
305b3(mdo sde): phrag ni// gang+ka'i bye ma snyed dag tu// dbyangs kyis go bar mdzad pas na// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// 'dren pas phyug ri ya cig gis// zhing rnams bye snyed blangs mdzad cing //
305b4(mdo sde): bskal pa bye bar de bzhugs pas// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes rjod do// zhing rnams stong phrag bye/ snyed na// ri bo lhur po ji snyed pa// skra nyag gcig gis de snrums shing // zhing
305b5(mdo sde): rnams bye bar 'phen mdzad la// chos rnams kun la rang byung zhing // gsan nas go 'phangab mchos brnyes la// sems can bcings pa rnam 'grel pas// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod
305b6(mdo sde): do// dbang ldan gyur cing stobs bcu lnga// mi bsnyengs rtogs par thugs su chud// sangs rgyas chos la rim nur med// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// dbu yi gtsug tor bltar mi
305b7(mdo sde): mthong // spyan lnga dag dang ldan pa dang // stobs dang dbang po lnga mnga' zhing // byang chub yan lag lam la gnas// ngang tshul bzang zhing 'grogs na bde// zhi zhing dul la bla na med//
306a1(mdo sde): g.yo med drang po gsal ba ste// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// de ni rtag tu mnyam bzhag cing // de la g.yeng ba mi mnga' la// sems can don gyis dus su
306a2(mdo sde): gsung // de phyir sangs rgyas zhes rjod do// yon tan kun dang legs ldam ning // de ni 'gro ba'i mchod rten te// thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes
306a3(mdo sde): brjod do// nga yis bskal pa 'am yang na mi/ bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang // gang phyir sangs rgyas de don brjod// de phyir sangs rgyas zhes brjod do// de nas bu mo
306a4(mdo sde): zla mchog dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te// rab tu dga'a'u zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas// de bzhin gshegs pa blta bas yongs su sgom par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
306a5(mdo sde): pa'i sku de la phyir tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gang gi yon tan de 'dra ba'i// rdzogs songs de ltar ji thog gam// chos 'di thos na mkhas pa ni// su zhig skad 'ga' 'ang khyim
306a6(mdo sde): la dga'// ji srid bde gshegs ma mthong bar// bdag ni rmugs dang gnyid spong zhing // zas dang skom yang mi 'tshal la// stan la'ang mchis par mi bgyid do// bdag gis khyod
306a7(mdo sde): mthong shin tu rangs gyur cing // yon tan bdag cid thos nas bgag rab dang // mngon sum sangs rgyas de ni mthong 'gyur la// sbar zhing mtshungs med dga' bar 'gyur lags
306b1(mdo sde): grangs// bskal pa stong phrag bye bar 'jig rten na// skye bu mchog rnams mthong ba shin tu dkon// dgra bcom de'i mtshan deng thos bdag gis ni// rnyed pa legs rnyed bdag gis/
306b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba lta// sprul pa de yis de la 'di skad smras// sems can mchog de tshal chen nang na bzhugs// de yi dge 'dun stong phrag brgyad po dag/ dpa' bo sdig med mi gtsang
306b3(mdo sde): spangs pa yin// de dag re re'ang lag pa ya cig gis// bskal pa mang por stong gsum zhing 'dag cing // ting 'dzin mngon shes spobs pa rab thobs la// thos pas mi 'khru/
306b4(mdo sde): rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag rgyal ba mchod phyir rdzu 'phrul gyis// bye ba dpag med zhing du skad 'gas 'dong // dong nas sangs rgyas bye snyed mngon mchod cing // brtan rnams
306b5(mdo sde): phyir yang skad 'gas ldog par byed// bdag tu 'du shes sangs rgyas 'du shes med// zhing du 'du shes sems can 'du shes med// spros pa sna tshogs kun gyis ma gos shing //
306b6(mdo sde): sems can tshogs chen rnams kyi don kyang byed// dgra thub de dang byang chub sems dpa' dang // de bzhin dge slong dge 'dun lta 'dod cing // thub dbang drung nas chos mchog nyan 'dod na/
306b7(mdo sde): tshal chen gang na ston te bzhugs par song / de nas bu mo zla mchog pad+ma de nyid dang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji ltar bzhugs pa de nyid thogs bzhin du/
307a1(mdo sde): khang bzungs kyi steng de nas babs nas/ rang gi pha ma ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rang gi phra ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ yab gzigs ngan bu'i sug pa
307a2(mdo sde): lag pa na// pad+ma gser sdong mdzes pa yid du mchi// skyes bu dam pa'i sku la gzigs shig yum// mthong na su zhig de la skyabs mi mchi// rang gi gnas kun gser mdog 'dra ba
307a3(mdo sde): yi / 'od kyis gsal bar bdag gis mthong lags yum// skad cig la yang du mar mdog 'gyur bas// sku yi tshad ni gzung bar rngo mi thog/ de slad rgyal ba'i spyan sngar tshal chen du
307a4(mdo sde): rgyal ba goru ta ma gzigs su gshegs so yum// me tog rnams dang spros mchog bsdams nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa la ni mchod par bgyi// zla ba mchog go pa dang ma dag gis/
307a5(mdo sde): yid du 'ong ba'i chog thos legs so zhes// gos rnams dang ni bdug spros spos dag dang / me tog rnams dang 'phreng ba byug pa'ang byungs// rnga chen rdza rnga rbab shang gdugs rnams dang / du
307a6(mdo sde): dang rgyal mtshar gling bu pi wang dang // rin chen sil snyan yid 'ong thogs nas ni// de dag khang pa de nas nges par 'byung // de'i tshe na nyi ma bdun pa de la srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag
307a7(mdo sde): bu mo zla mchog blta ba'i phyir 'dus par gyur nas/ de dag las kha cig ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyis sems kun nas dkris par gyur// kha cig ni lha 'dod par gyur// kha cig ni/
307b1(mdo sde): rtog pa skyes par gyur nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po rgyan gyis brgyan to// de nas khye'u dang bu mo dag kyang stegs bu dang mo/ khang dang rta babs dang /
307b2(mdo sde): skar khung dang / pu shu dang khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzangs kyi steng dag tu dong ste 'khod par gyur to// de nas bu mo zla mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang
307b3(mdo sde): thogs bzhin du pha ma dang 'khor mang po rnams dang lhan cig tu/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / smos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs pa
307b4(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag thogs te/ sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa sna tshogs byed pa de dag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to// rang gi gnas nas byung ngo // de nas
307b5(mdo sde): srog chags 'bum phrag du ma dag gis de grong bar gyi dbus su byung ba mthong ba dang / bdag gis 'di gzung bar bya'o// bdag gis 'di gzungs par bya'o snyam du sems shing rab tu rgyug go//
307b6(mdo sde): de'i tshe na yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por skye bo phal po che de dag lhan cig tu rgyug pa'i tshe/ ha ha tshur shog/ tshur shog ces bya ba'i sgra chen po byung bar gyur to// de nas bu mo
307b7(mdo sde): zla mchog gis de'i mod la skye bo phal po che rgyug pa de dag mthong nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa de nyid kyang thogs bzhin du bar snang gi nam mkha' la shing ta la'i
308a1(mdo sde): srid du mngon par 'phags te 'dug par gyur to// 'dug nas kyang skye bo phal po de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ bzod ldan bdag gi mdzes pa'i lus 'di ni// chags
308a2(mdo sde): pa'i sems las byung ba ma yin te// kha dog gser mdog me lce 'bar 'dra ba// shin tu yid 'ong kho mo'i lus 'di ltos// gang dag yul rnams la ni brkam med nas// me ma dag
308a3(mdo sde): 'obs 'ang rab 'bar 'dod spong zhing // dbang po drug rnams sdom pas bsdam pa dang// gang dag chungs spyod nam spyod dag pa dang // gang dag gzhan gyi bu med rnams mthong na// mthing
308a4(mdo sde): snyam du 'du shes skyer byed na// de dag mdzes shing shin tu blta sdug la// rtag tu mchog tu yid du 'ong bar 'gyur// gang gis sa 'di kun tu khyab byed pa/ bdag gi spu yis khung
308a5(mdo sde): nas byung ba'i dri// 'dod chags sems kyis bdag gis de ma bsgrubs// de ni sbyin dang dul ba'i 'bras bu yin// kho mo 'dod chags ldan pa'i sems mi skyed// 'dod chags bral
308a6(mdo sde): la chags pa me skyed cig/ ji ltar smras bden nam yang brdzun min te// mdun gyi thub dbang 'di ni bdag gi dbang // sngar chang khyed cag kho mo'i par gyur la// kho mo'ang khyed kyi ma dang phu nu dang
308a7(mdo sde): sring mo 'am par yang yang dang yang gyur pas// su zhig ma la 'dod chags sems skyed byed// sngan chad kho mos khyed cag bsad gyur cing // khyed kyis kho mos 'ang sngan chad bsad gyur pas/
308b1(mdo sde): thams cad phan tshun dgra bo gshed ma yin// khyod cag ji ltar 'dod chags sems skyed byed// chags pas gzugs dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing // chags sems can dag bde 'gror
308b2(mdo sde): 'gro mi gyur// chags pa'i sems ldan mya ngan mi 'da' bas// de phyir 'dod chags yongs su spang bar bya// 'dod pa'i gzhi las dmyal bar 'gro 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags las ni/
308b3(mdo sde): yi dgas dud 'gror 'gyur// gang dag 'dod chags dkris pa'i sems ldan pa// grul bum lha min gnod sbyin sha zar 'gyur// 'dod chags las ni zher batheng po dang // lce med
308b4(mdo sde): gzugs mi sdug pa dag tu 'gyur// gang dag 'dod chags ngan pa'i spyad spyod pa// rnam pa sna tshogs skyon gyi snod du 'gyur// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob pa dang // sum cu gsum
308b5(mdo sde): ba'i dbang phyug brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dngang ldan dbang sgyur gang yin pa// de yi tshangs spyod yangs pa spyad pa yin// rtag tu 'dod pa dag la brkam pa rnams// dmus long 'on pa sbyin
308b6(mdo sde): pa khyi phag dang // rnga mo bong bu spre'u dang glang po dang // stug drang gnag Na phye bre ba sbrang bur 'gyur// gang dag tshangs spyod yang ba spyod byed pa// sa yi dbang phyug dga' ba rnams dang ni// tshong
308b7(mdo sde): dpon khyim bdag blon por gyur nas ni// bde zhing yid bde zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ rang rgyal rnams dang bde bzhin dgra bcom dang // sangs rgyas mtshan gyis spras pa gsal gyur cing /
309a1(mdo sde): bla med byang chub zhi brtogs gyur nas// sems can tshogs cher rnam kyi ngor mdzad 'gyur// 'dod pas 'khol ba dag ni bsreng pa dang / yang na du bas bdug cing gsang/
309a2(mdo sde): pa 'am// bcing dang de bzhin brdeg bsdigs mgo dang ni// rna mig snga dang rkang pa bcud par 'gyur// 'dod spyod nyes pa gcig tu ma zad de// 'dod rnams mi mthun nyes pa mtha' yang med//
309a3(mdo sde): gal te myur du de las thar 'dod na// tshur sheg rgyal ba de yi sbyar sngar dang // lha mis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas me togs par// rten dang dpung gnyen gzhan dgra yod min zhing // rgyal ba
309a4(mdo sde): 'byung ba bskal pa brgyar dkon gyis// thams cad lhar cig 'grogs te 'dong bar bya// bu mo zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras ma thag tu de nas de'i mod las chen po rab tu
309a5(mdo sde): g.yas par gyur cing nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis kyang a la la zhes ca co dang / ga zha'i sgra chen po 'bum phrag du ma dag rab tu phyung ste/ me tog gi char dag kyang
309a6(mdo sde): rab tu phab/ sil sbyar bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang rab tu bsil to// skye bo phal po che de dag kyang shin tu yid byung zhing spu zing zhes byed la ngo mtshar du 'dzin par gyur ras/
309a7(mdo sde): 'gar yang phyin chad 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mu dang / khro ba dang / thab dang / 'chab pa dang gnod sems dang / rnam par gnod pa med cing thams cad kyang sems kyi
309b1(mdo sde): sgrib pa dang bral lA/ lus rab tu sem ning nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur nas// bu mo snamachog de lam dang sring mo dang / sbyor ba ma thar sdug par gyur cing byag brus te
309b2(mdo sde): dza ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa de dag gis kyang mngon par gtor ro// gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus de nas
309b3(mdo sde): de'i mod la me tog de dag me tog gi gdugs dpag tshad byed tsam pa 'og tu gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng na 'dug par gyur to//
309b4(mdo sde): de nas bu mo zla mchog par snang de las babs te/ sor bzhi tsam gyis sa la ma reg par nam mkha' la 'chag bzhin du yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ngo // de'i rkang pa
309b5(mdo sde): bzhag pa dang / bteg pa thams cad du sa chen po rab tu g.yos pa dang / yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong tham pa yang bu mo zla mchog song ba'i
309b6(mdo sde): phyir bzhin 'brang bar gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos bgos te/ lkung
309b7(mdo sde): bzed thogs nas bsod snyoms kyi phyir/ yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen por zhugs pa dang / nyan thos chen po de dag gis bu mo bla mchog skye bo phal po ches yongs su bskor cing rgyang ring po 'is
310a1(mdo sde): 'ong ba mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po bu mo zla mchog 'di ni bcom/
310a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'gro na/ bdag cag gis 'di ci bzod pa thob zhig gam/ 'on te ma yin zhes shes par byas/ dri ba 'ga' zhig yongs su ri bar bya'am zhes/ de nas tshe dang
310a3(mdo sde): rdzar pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dge slong de dag dang ldan cig tu bu mo rdza mchog ga la ba der song ste phrin nas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod gar 'gro/ bu mos spras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i dri/
310a4(mdo sde): gang 'di skad du khyod gar 'gro zhes gsung ba ni gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus spras pa/ bu mo kho bo ri yangs pa can du 'jug la/ khyod ni yangs pa
310a5(mdo sde): can ras 'byung na/ 'o ma khyod 'di skad du gnas brtan gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi lags so// zhes zer ba de ji ltar rigs par 'gyur/ bu mos spras pa/ bcur ba shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyed zhabs
310a6(mdo sde): gang nas 'dig cing gang du 'jog par mdzad lags shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bo ni rkang pa nam mkha' las 'dog cing / nam mkha' nyid la 'jog par byed do// du mos spras pa ga btsun pa
310a7(mdo sde): bA ra dwa ti'i bu bdag kyang sug pa nam mkha' las 'deg cing / nam mkha' nyid la 'jog par bgyid de/ nam mkha'i khams la ni tha dad pa cung zad kyang ma mchi bas/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ re'i
310b1(mdo sde): slad du bdag gis 'di skad ces khyod gang du bzhud pa de nyid du bdag kyang mchi lags so// zhes smras so// btsun pa shA ra ru ti'i bu khrod gar gshegs pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo la ba
310b2(mdo sde): ni mya ngan las 'das par 'gro'o// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dra ti'i bu chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa mchi ba lags pas/ bdag kyang der mchi ba lags sam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus
310b3(mdo sde): smras pa/ bu mo gal te chos thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba yin na/ 'o na khyod ci'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mi 'gro// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
310b4(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing // yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba la ni skye ba dang / 'jig pa yang ma mchis la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi
310b5(mdo sde): ba la ma gtog par gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba 'ga' yang ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba nyid yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa lags
310b6(mdo sde): pa'i slad du'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo 'o na ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam 'on te rang
310b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ 'on te theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad du/ khyod theg pa gang la yang dag
311a1(mdo sde): bar zhugs pa yin zhes gsung ba ni/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la zhus/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan garab tu gsol/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i/
311a2(mdo sde): bu khyod kyis rtogs pa'i chos gang lags pa'i chos de/ ci nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags sam/
311a3(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhig lags shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo de ma yin mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de la ni rnam par rtog pa 'am/ spros pa 'ga' yang med la
311a4(mdo sde): tha dad pa nyid kyang ma yin/ gcig pa nyid kyang ma yin sna tshogs nyid kyang ma yin pa'i phyir ro// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa dang / spros pa ma
311a5(mdo sde): mchis pa'i chos thams cad dang / tha dad du dbyer ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la ni gang gnas par 'gyur ba 'am yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i chos de dmigs su ma mchis
311a6(mdo sde): lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi spobs pa ni ngo mtshar na/ gzhan yang khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed cig la bsnyer bkur byas/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa
311a7(mdo sde): shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dza skad cig la bsnyen bkur byas shes gsung ba ni/ de bzhin nyid dang chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa la'o// shwa ra dwa ti'i bus
311b1(mdo sde): spras pa bu mo de bzhin nyid drung chos kyi dbyings kyang ji skad cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/
311b2(mdo sde): bu mo ma rig pa dang srid pa'i sred pa yang rngo snyed cig yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sems
311b3(mdo sde): can gyi khams kyang ji snyed cig yir/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul ji
311b4(mdo sde): sbeng ba'o// shA ra dwa ti bu'i smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyi/ ci zhig lan brtag pa yin/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gnas brtan gyis gang yongs su dris pa de nyid kyi lan
311b5(mdo sde): bdag gis btab lags so// shwa ra dra ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo kho bos ci zhig yongs su dris/ bu mos spras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu yi ge gang dag yongs su dris pa de dag
311b6(mdo sde): nyid nges par bstan lags so// shU ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bla mo yi ge rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa ste/ gdags su med pa yin pas de dag ni nges par bstar bar mi nus so// bu
311b7(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du skye ba ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i chos thams cad la yang gang gis yongs su dris pa dang
312a1(mdo sde): gang gis lan btab pa de gnyis ka yang dmigs su ma mchis lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo 'di ltar khyod ni bzod pa thob cing / byang chub sems dpa'i
312a2(mdo sde): rnam par dag par yod pa kho na yin pas khyod ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shwa
312a3(mdo sde): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub ces bgyi ba de yang smyos pa lags so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// zhes bgyi ba de yang spros pa lags so// nye ba zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ring ba zhes bgyi ba de yang
312a4(mdo sde): spros pa lags so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gang 'di skad ces khyod ni ring por mi thogs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ni/
312a5(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ri skye ba ma mchis pa 'gag pa ma mchis pa/ chad pa ma mchis pa/ rtag pa ma mchis pa/ don cig pa ma lags pa/ don tha dad pa ma
312a6(mdo sde): lags pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pas 'gro ba ma mchis pa brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'byung ba ma mchis pa// rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/ de la ni gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba
312a7(mdo sde): 'ga' yang dmigs su ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ byang chub ni gnyis kyi mtshan cing ma lags pa ste/ byang chub ni gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis dang bral ba lags pa'i srad du'o//
312b1(mdo sde): de ras tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bu mo sgra mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song shig dang / kho bo cag kyang chos mthan pa'i phyir der 'dong ngo do// de nas panas
312b2(mdo sde): brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la/ bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gsheg pa ni can mtshal ba rnams la chos ston par mi mdzad lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/
312b3(mdo sde): bu mo 'o na de bzhin gshegs pa su dag la chos ston par mdzad/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag nyan par bgyid kyang / dga' bar mi bgyid/ mngon par dga' bar mi bgyid pa rnams la'o//
312b4(mdo sde): shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo sems can mang po dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'dong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa yang de dag la chos ston par mi mdzad dam/ bu mos smras
312b5(mdo sde): ba btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin gshegs par 'du shes shing chos la ngar 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni 'di snyam du 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ bdag cag la chos soni/
312b6(mdo sde): par mdzad pa'o// 'di ni chos te bstan par bgyi ba'o snyam du sems lags kyi/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa rnams ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ chos sam/ bstan pa zhag bgyi bar
312b7(mdo sde): sems pa ma mchis lags so// de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos gnas brtan shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta bu'i spobs/
313a1(mdo sde): pa dang ldan pa'i bu mo 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'gro bas na/ der ni chos bstan pa chen po yang 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ bdag cag zan bcad de phyir log na ni 'o bu ca
313a2(mdo sde): la legs kyi/ bdag cag chos mnyan pa de lta bu las phyir rol tu gyur na ni ma yin no// de nas nyan thos chen po de dag phyir phyogs te/ de nyid nas phyir log par gyur to// de nas bu mo rdza
313a3(mdo sde): mchog tshal chen po'i khang pa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas
313a4(mdo sde): ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das
313a5(mdo sde): la mngon par gtor to// mngon par rab tu gtor to// skye bo bal po che de dag gis kyang ji ltar thogs pa'i me tog dang / bdug spos dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang byug pa dag gis
313a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to// gtor ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la me tog de dag me tog gi gdugs rgyar dpag tshad bcu tsam pa zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi
313a7(mdo sde): drang thad kyi stang na 'dug par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir 'ongasa'adi
313b1(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du 'gro bar 'gyur/ bu mos spras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di ji snyam du dgongs gang bdag gi sug pa g.yas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa 'di gang /
313b2(mdo sde): nas shi 'phos te 'dir byon lag 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni/ gang du skye bar 'gyur snyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ bu mo 'di ni sprul pa ste/ sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho yang med la skye ba yang
313b3(mdo sde): med do// bu mos smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gis kyang de bzhin du sprul pa'i rang bzhin gyi chos thams cad la gang 'chi 'pho ba 'am/ skye ba de ma mthong lags so// de nas byang
313b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' mthong ba don yod kyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo bud med kyi lus kyis ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus na/ khyod ci'i phyir bud med
313b5(mdo sde): kyi lus sgyur bar mi byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid lags pas/ stong pa nyid la ni ldog pa dang 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so//
313b6(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin gyis bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji ltar de bzhin gshegs
313b7(mdo sde): pa'i sku 'dis gzigs pa ltar bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong lags so// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs kyis spras pa/ bu mo khyod chos kyi gtam la spobs par gyis shig
314a1(mdo sde): bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos kyi dbyings la ri brjod par bgyi ba dang / rab tu brjod par bgyi ba ma mchis la/ chos kyi dbyings ni yi ger bgrang ba yang ma lags so//
314a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngoran gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyan sngar chos ji lta bu thos/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i slad du steng du gzigs
314a3(mdo sde): shig dang / bar snang ci 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa yang de 'dra la/ de bzhin gshegs pa ci 'dra bar chos bstan pa nyid kyang de 'dra/ nyan pa nyid kyang de 'dra ste/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni nam
314a4(mdo sde): mkha'i mtshan nyid de lta bu lags so// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la ji ltar sbyin pa byin zhing / ji ltar yongs su bsngos/ @
314a5(mdo sde): mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa zhig gis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa zhig phul bar gyur na/ de la rgyu ba ji lta bu zhig 'byung
314a6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur lags/ smras pa bu mo sprul pa la ni rgyu ba 'ga' yang 'byung ba med do// bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis kyang sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag la de ltar spyir ba byin zhing yongs su bsdu ba
314a7(mdo sde): lags so// byang chub sems dpa' thogs med sems kyis smras pa/ bu mo khyod sems can rnams la ji ltar byams pas khyab par byed/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sems can de dag ji lta ba kho na bzhin
314b1(mdo sde): du'o// smras pa/ bu mo sems can de dag kyang ji lta bu yin/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'das pa yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags la/ sems de yang 'das pa
314b2(mdo sde): yang ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa yang ma lags/ da ltar byung ba yang ma lags pas/ byams pa sgom pa de ni 'di dra'o zhes gdags par rngo mi theg lags so// byang chub sems dpa' mchog tu dga'
314b3(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal pos spras pa bu mo khyod kyis chos kyi mig thob bam/ bu mos smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis sha'i mig kyang ma thob lags na/ chos kyi mig lha thob par gal 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'
314b4(mdo sde): blo gros brtan pas smras pa/ bu mo khyod yun ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs/ bu mos spras pa/ rigs kyi bu yun ji srid cig nas/ smig rgyu la chu yang
314b5(mdo sde): dag par zhugs pa'i yun de srid nas/ bdag kyang byang chub la yang dag par zhugs lags so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ bu mo zla mchog la 'di skad ces smras so//
314b6(mdo sde): bu mo khyod yun ji srid cig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ yun ji srid cig gis byang chub sems dpa' byams pa so so'i skye bo'i sa
314b7(mdo sde): las 'da' bar 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi sa las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur ba de srid kyis lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
315a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sring mo 'di gtso bo chen po/ go cha chen po bgos pa ka 'di lta bu dag dang lhan cigasang dag pa smras yang 'jigs par mi bgyid/ dman par mi bgyid pa ni bu mo/
315a2(mdo sde): 'di'i spobs pa ngo mtshar lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la bu mo zla mchog gis 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ zhugs ni ji tsam du
315a3(mdo sde): chung yang sreg pa'i ngo bo nyid lags pas/ ji tsam du nye bar len pa rnyed pa de tsam du sreg par bgyid lags so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
315a4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi bgrod pa tha dad du dbye ba cung zad kyang ma mchis pas de dag thams cad bdag dang gzhan ngag gi nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras
315a5(mdo sde): pa/ bu mo byang chub thob na khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ci 'dra bar 'gyur/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gnas brta na shA ra dwa ti'i
315a6(mdo sde): khu ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sems can dmar pa la mos la/ shes rab chung ba gzhan gyi don la mi lta ba/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa dag gi ming yang grag par mi 'gyur ba de lta bur
315a7(mdo sde): 'gyur lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa bu mo gang khyod 'di skad ces chos kyi dbyings ri gcig go// de bzhin nyid ni gcig go/ zhes zer ma 'o na ci khyod kyis nyan thos rnams ni dman pa nyid
315b1(mdo sde): yin la/ ci sangs rgyas rnams ni lhag pa yin par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na ba glang gi rjes kyi chab gang lags pa dang ga rgya mtsho
315b2(mdo sde): chen po gang lags pa'i chub de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'or kyang ba glang gi rjes la ni rgya mtsho chen po ltar sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag gi go skabs ma mchis pa lags
315b3(mdo sde): so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyang chos kyi dbyings gcig las nges par 'gyur ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyis na de bzhin
315b4(mdo sde): gshegs pa dag ltar sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thog lags so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste dper bgyi na/ yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i nam
315b5(mdo sde): mkha'i khams gang lags pa dang ga phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha'i khams gang lags pa'i nam mkha'i khams de dag la ni bye brag cung zad kyang
315b6(mdo sde): ma mchis lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang yungs 'bru'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha' la ni phyogs bcu'i khongs su chud pa'i nam mkha' ltar grong khyer dang / yul 'khor dang rgyal po'i pho zang dag rab tu mi
315b7(mdo sde): gnas shing kun tu mi gnas na/ ri'i rgyal po rab dag kyang ma mchis rgya mtsho chen po dag kyang ma mchis legs so// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang /
316a1(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams kyang stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa gcig las nges par byung ba lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang nyan thos rnams kyi ni de bzhin
316a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag ltar sems can tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa dag gi don bgyid par rngo mi thog lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa / bu mo
316a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam par grol ba gcig pa ma yin nam/ bu mos smras pa/ btsun+da pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang 'di skad ces sangs rgyas rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam
316a4(mdo sde): par grol ba gcig go zhes gsung ba ni skur ba 'debs pa lags so// shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo ci'i phyir/ bu mos smras pa/ btsur pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i slad du de khyod nyid la yongs su zhus
316a5(mdo sde): khyod kyis ji ltar brjod pa de bzhin du lan garab tu gsol/ gang gi tshe btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu'i sems rnam par grol ba de'i tshe/ ji ga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil ltar
316a6(mdo sde): mnyam par kun tu gnas par gyur lags sam/ jig shing ldong pa dang ri thams cad kyis khyod logs su mngoran bapar phyogs te btud mngon par btud/ mngon par rab btud lags sam/ dzi ga ngan song thams
316a7(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi bar gyur lags sam/ jig sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur lags sam/ jig song gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'og tu mnar ma mchis pa 'thug pa
316b1(mdo sde): yan chad dang / steng du 'og min gyi gnas kyi mthar thug pa'i bar dag 'od gzer gyi kha dog lta bus sdang bar gyur lags sam/ thig lha thams cad kyis phyag bgyis lags sam/ jig bdud kyis sa dang nam
316b2(mdo sde): mkha' dpag tshad sum du tshun chad dpung gis khyab par bgyis te mchis par gyur lags sam/ jig sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi rnam par grol lags sam/ ji ga khyod byang chub
316b3(mdo sde): pa dang dus gcig kho nar bdud thams cad nges par bcom lags sam/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus smras pa/ bu mo khyod kyis kho bo la ji skad smras pa de dag las de'i rgyu gcig tsam yang ma byung ngo // bu mos smras
316b4(mdo sde): pa/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po dam pa la gnas pa la ni yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang gzhan yang dpag tu ma mchis pa dag byung bar gyur pas na/ btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/
316b5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba dang / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i khyad par ni re lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bu mo zla mchog la leg so shes bya ba byin te/ bu mo leg/
316b6(mdo sde): so legs so// bu mo khyod de skad ston pa ni yang khyod legs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus bu mo zla mchog gi lag pa g.yas par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku pad+ma la bzhugs pa byung bar gyur
316b7(mdo sde): pa gang yin pa de/ pad+ma'i gdan de las mngon par 'phags te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku lte ba'i khung du zhugs so// de nas de'i
317a1(mdo sde): mod la sangs rgyas kyi mthus sa chen po rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spu'i khung bu thams cad ras pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ sdong bu rnams ni gsera'adabs
317a2(mdo sde): rnams ni dngul/ snying po rnams ni rin po che dpal gyi snying po las grub pa dag byung bar gyur to// pad+ma de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa/ pad+ma bzhugs pa dag kun tu
317a3(mdo sde): snang bar gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu gshegs te sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na chos ston par kun tu/
317a4(mdo sde): blang zhing / 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos bstan pa de dag kyang 'dir kun tu glag go/ de nas bu mo zla mchog gis de lta bu'i tshe 'bra chen po mthong nas dga' zhing mgul mi rangs te/
317a5(mdo sde): rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid dade ba skyes nas/ des lag pa g.yas pan thogs par gyur pa'i pad+ma gang yin pa de/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu
317a6(mdo sde): de me tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa gru bzhi lham pa/ ka bzhi zug pa/ cha mnyam pa shin tu rnam par phye ba zhig tu gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang zad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la 'dug
317a7(mdo sde): par gyur to// khang pa brtsegs pa der yang khri gdan rkang pa rin po ches spras pa lnga'i ras bcos bu 'bum phrag du ma gting bzhig byung bar gyur to// khri gdan de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
317b1(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ga bzhugs par yang kun tu snang ngo // des pad+ma de 'phangs nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
317b2(mdo sde): 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams la ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs
317b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i lag par pad+ma gnyis pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phang sa ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng
317b4(mdo sde): du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gnyis pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / des tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang 'brel ba'i sems
317b5(mdo sde): can rnams la'ajig tshogs la lta ba spangs pa'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ de'i lag par pad+ma gsum pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom
317b6(mdo sde): lngan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi stang du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa gsum pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang
317b7(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rtogs pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug spang ba'i slad du/
318a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bzhi pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs/
318a2(mdo sde): su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thug tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa ba'i ba zhig tu gyur pa dang tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
318a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis phyin ci log bzhi spang ba'i slad du/ sems cad rnams la chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma lnga pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang /
318a4(mdo sde): des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa lnga pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad
318a5(mdo sde): ces kyang gsol te// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sgrib pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sgrib pa lnga spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi
318a6(mdo sde): mthus de'i lag par pad+ma drug pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs pa thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang
318a7(mdo sde): pa rtsigs pa drug pazhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig ri de gad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis rgya mched drug la rten pa'i sems can rnams la sems can rnams te
318b1(mdo sde): mched drugu yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bdun pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su
318b2(mdo sde): 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa mdun pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa
318b3(mdo sde): pa 'dis rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la rnam par shes pa gnas pa bdur yongs su 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus
318b4(mdo sde): de'i lag par pad+ma brgyad pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa
318b5(mdo sde): brgyad pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis log pa nyid brgyad la nges pa'i sems can rnams la log pa nyid brgyad nges par spang ba'i slad
318b6(mdo sde): du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma dgu pa zhig byung bar gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom
318b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa dgu pa zhig tu gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu la
319a1(mdo sde): gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/ kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po dgu spang ba'i slad du chos ston par gyur cig/ yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lag par pad+ma bcu pa zhig byung bar
319a2(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / des de yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su 'phangs so// 'phangs ma thag tu pad+ma de yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i btsug gi drang zad kyi steng du pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa bcu pa zhig tu
319a3(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / tshig 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ji ltar da ltar bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcur snang bas khyab par mdzad pa ltar stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i
319a4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas su gyur cig de nas pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gong nas gong du brtsegs pa'i bang gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi mthar thug par gyur to// de'i tshe nas zla bu'i lha yan chad
319a5(mdo sde): nas tshangs ris kyi bar gyi lha rnams la pad+ma'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gis yang dag par bskul nas/ lha bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa dag 'dus par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan
319a6(mdo sde): 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od gzer kha dog du ma/ kha dog sna
319a7(mdo sde): tshogs kha dog 'bum phrag du ma 'di lta ste sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod ka dang / shel dang / dngul gyi mdog lta bu dag byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten
319b1(mdo sde): gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ 'od kyi nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas phyir log ste/ bcom
319b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kur dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
319b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dzum pa'i don yongs su zhus pa// mkhyen pa kun la mngon sum spyan mnga'
319b4(mdo sde): zhing / chos rnams kun la nem nur rnam dag la// 'jig rten kun dang mi mnyam thugs mnga' ba// rgyal dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod kyis mtha' yas dus nas sbyin pa byin// khyod khrim
319b5(mdo sde): rnam dag nor bu rin chen 'dra// khyod kyis bzod pa'ang mi g.yos lhun po bzhin// drang srong chen po ci srad 'dzum pa mdzad// bsam gtan bsres shing brtson 'grus stobs ldan pa// gnod bral na dang /
319b6(mdo sde): rga las rnam par grol// rgya mtsho 'dra bar shin tu zab pa'i blo// thub chen ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// byams la gnas shing thugs rjer gnas pa'o// thub pa btang snyoms dang ni dga' la
319b7(mdo sde): gnas// 'dod chags la sogs 'jigs bsal rab tu zhe// thub dbang ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// khyod spu gcig nas byung ba'i 'od gzer des// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten mtha' yas khams
320a1(mdo sde): rnams su// nyi zla myur du mog mog rab mdzad de// gzi brjid zil gyis gnon cing mig kyang rtsol// 'gro ba'i mgon gcig khyod gsung rnam par dag/ snyan cing yid
320a2(mdo sde): 'od yan lag drug tu ldan// gang dag nyan pa de dag mi ngoms shing // nyon mongs thams cad ma lus zhi bar bgyid// phyogs bcu mtha' yas sems can gang mchis pa'i// sems kyi spyod pa
320a3(mdo sde): du ma gang lags pa// de mkhyen de dag som ci gcod pa po// rang byung ci srad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// deng su'i sems ni byang chub skad du nges// su zhig sangs rgyas theg pa yangs par zhugs/
320a4(mdo sde): khyab bdag gang gi yid bsams rab tu grub// thub dbang ci srad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// gang gi de ring bdud pa ni pham bgyis shing // nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud chen dang // gang gis
320a5(mdo sde): phung po lnga bu mang po'i bdud// pham par bgyis sam ci srad khyod 'dzum mdzad// de ring su 'gadon chen yangs 'gyur zhing // su zhig chos lo legs bgyid mi seng ge/ de ring su zhig s+tha ni phyogs
320a6(mdo sde): rnams mchi// thub dbang ci srad 'dzum par rab tu mdzad// kun mkhyen mi dge thams cad rab spangs pa// sems can kun la mtshungs par byams pa po// g.yo ba kun dang rtog pa rnam spangs
320a7(mdo sde): drang srong chen po ci srad 'dzum pa mdzad// de ring su zhig yangs pa chen po 'thob// deng su'i sems kyi smon pa legs 'grub cing // deng su stobs bcu rnams dang ldan par 'gyur// dgra thul
320b1(mdo sde): ci slad 'dzum pa rab tu mdzad// mkha' la gnas pa lha klu bye ba dang // gnod sbyin mkha' lding lto 'phye cher brtsas dang // sa la thal sbyar skyes pa bu med rnams// dga' zhing lha mi dbang po zla ba ltar/
320b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang po ni// dam chos 'tshal ba rgya mtsho lta bu dag/ phyogs bcu dag nas lpags pa dgra thul ba// yongs dag thugs mnga' 'dzum don bshad du gsol/
320b3(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang gis rgyal ba'i cho 'phrul mchog mthong nas// byang chub phyir ri rgya chen sems bskyed cing /
320b4(mdo sde): nga yi mdun na thal sbyar gang 'dug pa// mdun gyi bu mo mthong ngam kun dga' bo// 'dis ni sngon gyi srid par rtag tu yang // rgyal ba sum brgya legs par mchod byas shing // ji ltar bdag ni byang chub mchog
320b5(mdo sde): reg ces// rgyal ba de dag kun la mngon sum zhus/ nam yang lan 'ga' ngan 'gror ma song zhing // 'di ni rtag tu lha mi'i 'jig rten skyes// nam yang byang chub sems rim brjed cing // 'chi dus byas/
320b6(mdo sde): kyang rtag tu tshe rabs drar// rgyal ba 'od srung zhes bya mthong nas ni// khang bzangs steng nas mdzes pa'i lus mchongs te// rgya chen sems kyis 'od srungs de mchod nas// de nas rjes 'thun bzod pa
320b7(mdo sde): thob par gyur// sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig ces mtshan gsol po// de la na bza' dam pa phrug phul bas// de phyir 'di yi lus mdog gser 'dra la// mdzes shing dag la zla ba 'dra ba yin// ston pa
321a1(mdo sde): gser thub ces bya gang yin pa// de la bdug pa spos mchog phul bas na// de'i phyir 'di yi kha dang spu khung nas// ut+pal can dan dri ngang rab tu byung // gtsug tor zhes bya rkang gnyis
321a2(mdo sde): mchog de la// 'dis ni mtshan bdun nges par brtag gyur pas// de phyir 'di yi mig mdog mthon thing lo// 'gro ba rtog par byed pa ngoms mi 'gyur// tshe rab lnga brgyad gi bu 'dod spangs shing // tshangs spyod rnam
321a3(mdo sde): par spyod pa dag byas pas// de phyir chags pas gdungs pas 'di mthong ra// de tshe 'dod chags can dag chags bral 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas nas 'di 'phos te// 'dir ling tsa byi khyim ni yangs par
321a4(mdo sde): skyes// skye dgu kun tu tshe rabs dran gyur cing // tshigs bcad dbyangs kyis smra ba'i byab shes// pha ma yongs su smin par bya ba dang // de bzhin sems can gzhan dor byed 'dod cing // lal byang chub phyir dri
321a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed phyir// de phyir yangs pa'i khyim 'dir rab tu skyes// bud med skyes pa nyid du mdza' bshes dang // gzhon nu gzhon nu ma dag gdul ba'i phyir// de dag stong phrag drug cu 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas theg
321a6(mdo sde): pa mchog la yongs smin byas// 'di ni ring po mi thogs bud med kyi// lus bskur nga yi bstan la rab byung zhing // tshangs spyod dam pa rgya chen spyad byas nas// shi 'phos lho yi 'jig rten 'gro bar 'gyur//
321a7(mdo sde): gnas de nas shi 'phos phyir yang ni// dus mtha'i tshe na chos 'di srungs 'gyur zhing // 'dir yang skye dgu'i don chen byas nas ni// 'di nas phyir yang dga' ldan 'gro bar 'gyur// gang che mi 'pham dgra las rgyal
321b1(mdo sde): ba bo// dung gi sras su gyur te 'byung ba'i tshe// de ni ba zo don sgyu rtsal bya ba kur// shes shing mdzes la yon tan kun ldan 'gyur// srog chags brgya phrag du mas mdun bdar cing // zla ba gsum du rgyal ba de/
321b2(mdo sde): mchod nas// de ni srog chags drug stong sum brgya dang // lhan cig khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung 'gyur zhing // rgyal ba mi 'pham bzhugs dang 'das pa yin// chos kyi tshul yang kun tu 'dzin par 'gyur//
321b3(mdo sde): de 'dra'i dbang po de nas shis 'phos nas// bde ba can gyi 'jig rten khams su 'gro// blo ldan des ni 'od dpag med pa dang // gzhan yang phyogs bcu mtha' yas bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas bye mang
321b4(mdo sde): gan+d+ha'i klung gi ni// bye snyed mthong zhing bsnyer bkur byed par 'gyur// ting 'dzin mngon shes brtson 'grus stobs thob cing // bskal pa bzangs la gang dag phyis 'byung ba'i// rang byung 'jig rten rnam
321b5(mdo sde): la phan brtson pa// 'jig rten dgon de dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byed// bye mang bskal par de dag mchod byas te// sems can bye mang yongs su smin byas shing // bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu na//
321b6(mdo sde): rgyal ba za mchog ces ni bya bar 'gyur// zla mchog rkang gnyis gtso bo'i mdzod spu nus// 'od gzer gser mdog shin tu yid 'ong ba// gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag gis// 'jig rten
321b7(mdo sde): khams de kun tu gsal bar 'gyur// gang phyir 'od kyis 'jig rten de khyab pas// ci bla ma dang nor bu'i 'od rnams ni// snang bar mi 'gyur rgyu skar tshogs min zhing // cin dang mtshan yang bzang du yod ma/
322a1(mdo sde): #yin// de tshe rang sangs rgyas dag yod der ring // nyan thos rnams med mu sogs can tshogs med// man+t+ram med de yi dge 'dun rnam dag cing // bud med rnam par spangs pa
322a2(mdo sde): nyid du 'gyur// mi rnams thams cad gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing // bsod nams brgya yi mtshan can blta na sdug/ mngal ni mi gnas 'dod pa mi sten cing // pad+ma'i nang nas rdzus te skye zhing 'byung //
322a3(mdo sde): rgyal sras rnams kyi tshogs 'byung gang yin pa// de ni bgrang bas rtogs par mi nus shing // thams cad mngon shes thob pa de la spyod dang // mi skye bzod cing mnyam med chags pa med// de na bdud
322a4(mdo sde): med dmigs can yod min zhing // bslab pa 'dral med phyogs 'dzin yod ma yin// 'jig rten khams de dag cing dga' ldan gyi// nye bar spyod pa'i rnam pa 'dra bar 'gyur// gser dngul mu tig dam
322a5(mdo sde): pa'i dri mchog gis// spras shing gtsang la dri med yangs pa yin// rgyal ba de yi sku che lo grangs no// stong phrag bye ba bdun cu gsum du 'gyur// ston pa do na'i bar gshegs gyur nas// de tshangam
322a6(mdo sde): chos bskal pa gcig gnas shing // bzhugs bzhin mya ngan 'das na'ang de yin// dam chos mdzod la nyams par 'gyur ba med// gal te rgyal ba dang ni zhing de yi// phun sum tshogs pa bskal
322a7(mdo sde): par brjod byas kyang // rgya mtsho dag las chu thigs gcig bzhin du// dpe yang brjod par 'gyur ba ma yin no// de nas bu mo zla mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid mngon
322b1(mdo sde): sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba de nyid kyis shing ta la bdun srid tsam du nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags so// mngon par 'phags ma thag tu bu mo de'i bud med kyi lus
322b2(mdo sde): 'gyur cing // skyes pa'i lus mngon par grub par gyur pa dang // 'jig rten dus chen po yang rab tu g.yos par gyur/ me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu bab/ lha dang mi'i sil skan 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang
322b3(mdo sde): sgra 'khrol bar gyur to// 'jig rten kun tu snang ba chen pos khyab par yang gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zla mchog gis bar snang de nyid la 'dug bzhin du// bcom ldan 'das
322b4(mdo sde): la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// ri rab g.yo zhing nam mkha' sar lhung la// lha gnas skad cig tsam la 'jig 'gyur zhing // rgya mtsho mig yo dgung zla lhung yang gda'// de
322b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa sho ba'i tshig mi gsung // phyogs bcu'i sems can lus rnams gcig 'gyur zhing // zhugs ni cha ba 'gyur chab ni zhugs 'gyur gda'// mnyam med thub dbang yon tan
322b6(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i gnas// 'gro la phan bzhed log pa'i tshig mi gsung // bar snang dog sa kur tu 'dzin 'gyur zhing // yungs khabru'i nang du zhing brgya chud 'gyur la// gser ma zhags pas gzung bar rdo
322b7(mdo sde): theg gda'// rgyal ba log pa'i tshig na gsung mi 'gyur// de 'dra la yang dag de bzhin nyid gsung ba'i// rgyal ba des bdag byang chub nges bstan cing // gang phyir dogs kun tu rab g.yos pas/ byang chub
323a1(mdo sde): dam pa thob 'gyur gor ma bkum// sangs rgyas theg mchog bdag lung bstan pas na// rang 'byung gis ni ji skad gsungs de dang // sngan chad skal brgyar bdag gis gang bca
323a2(mdo sde): pa// de ltar bdag gis chos mchog 'khor lo basbyor// lha mi lha min gnod sbyin dge slong dang // dge bsnyen rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' dag/ thams cad mnyam med mthu stobs ldan pa yi//
323a3(mdo sde): bde gshegs 'gyur gyis som nyi ma byed cig/ chos 'di thams cad sgyu ma lta bu ste// rgyal ba rnams kyis longs spyod rmi 'dra zhing // bdag med gso ba shed bu 'ga' yang med// sems can srog med
323a4(mdo sde): gang zag med par gsung // gzod nas ngo bo nyid kyis chos rnams kun// rang bzhin dag cing ngo bo nyid med de// bdag sngon bu med rang bzhin gyur pa gang // de ni dngos med gsog stong yam brla/
323a5(mdo sde): phyi ma'i dngos de'ang stong zhing skad cig ste// dngos med mi g.yo srog dang ya ma brla// rtog dang rnam par rtog pa bral gyur cing // rtog gyur de yang mkha' la bya rjes bzhin// gang zhig mnyam
323a6(mdo sde): mer byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing // thul dka' bdud kyang rab tu gzhom pa dang // stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten khams su ni// chos kyi 'khor lo dam pa bskor 'dod pa// des ni brtan par
323a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems bskyed la// de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu mchod kyis dang // de ni myur du yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// ston pa rgyal ba sdig med lam rtogs 'gyur// skyes bu'i rtsal 'phags gsung
323b1(mdo sde): snyan mthar byor pa// rgyal ba'i mi mchog gcol phyag 'tshal lo// dga' mdzad rab dga'i dngos po rgyal mdzad pa// thub pa chos dbyig 'byung gnas dbang phyug bstod// bde ba'i 'byung gnas pang/
323b2(mdo sde): kun rab stsol ba// de bzhin pa gshegs bdud kyi tsher ma bkrugs// bsod 'os rnams kyis bstod pa gang zag mchog/ rang byung dbang ldan sred bral ba stod par bgyi// bdag gis phyogs su
323b3(mdo sde): bsdus na de dag tu// sdig med sangs rgyas brgya phrag bsam yas mthong // shAkya sang ge ji lta de lta bu// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas de dag bdag lung bstan// rgyal ba thams cad chos nyid sangs rgyas
323b4(mdo sde): gcig/ de bzhin chos kyang de bzhin nyid kyis gcig/ sems can rnams kyang yang dag mtha' nges par// gang la bzod 'di mchis pa rgyal bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
323b5(mdo sde): zla mchog gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag smras nas/ bar snang de las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la rab tu gtugs so// des rab tu gtugs ma thag tu sangs rgyas 'bum phrag mang po/
